programme.title: Wild Bavaria
programme.desc: The moon disappears behind the horizon and the stage is set for a new day in the Alps of Berchtesgaden.

programme.title: Children of the Sun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Children of the Sun - Butterflies
programme.desc: Butterflies surely are the most fancied species inside the insect world. Their beautiful colouring and their graceful flight appeal to everyone. There are close to 4000 types of Butterflies – today many of them are endangered due to the loss of their habitat.

programme.title: Children of the Sun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Children of the Sun - Wild Bees
programme.desc: Most people associate honey producing insects with the name “BEE“. Few realize that there are over 560 different species of bees - most of them live their lives “busy as a bee“ but some “abuse“ other insects and others are even known to be murderers. The film “Wild Bees” shows the incredible diversity and the stunning adaptations of our “BEES” to various habitats and diverse living conditions. Fascinating fights, sensational performances, imposing structures and colorful individuals – the world of “Wild Bees” offers all of this and more.

programme.title: Hummingbirds: Jewelled Messengers
programme.desc: Hummingbirds live at the limits of what is possible. They have the highest metabolism with a heart rate of 1,200 beats per minute of any vertebrate. Their wings beat 50 times a second. They can hover on the spot, and even fly backwards. To our eyes, they are just a blur. But with the aid of high-speed cameras we can slow down their hyperactive lives and look into their secret world.

programme.title: The Secret of Migrating Birds - Tryst at the Red Sea
programme.desc: Each year in spring, Israel witnesses a unique spectacle. Many millions of migrating birds cross the land bridge between Africa, Asia and Europe.Their first major roosting place after an exhausting nonstop flight over the African deserts is in southern Israel – a vital stopover. Here they replenish their energy reserves. The flocks of migrating birds are pursued by flocks of ornithologists. Hundreds of birders flood into the port city of Eilat on the Red Sea to take part in the Migration Festival. For a week, Israels southernmost coastal resort is home to international scientists and amateur birders.

programme.title: King of the Seas - Sea Eagle
programme.desc: The times where eagles have been seen as varmints are over. They are now perceived as an integral part of the food cycle. Due to the fact that the habitats of the sea eagles in Germany are largely found in the north-eastern regions that are rich in water, the movie accompanies the eagles to an island, home to hundreds of sea ravens, where they rob the baby sea ravens of their food. They seem to always profit from the successes of the fellow creatures in their habitats. This film introduces you to the expert poachers of the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Under the Spell of Horses
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Under the Spell of the Horses - Morocco
programme.desc: Once a year the royal city of Meknes is transformed into an oriental camp. Two thousand curious onlookers gather round the square. More than five hundred riders are expected to take part in this major Fantasia, a warlike display of horsemanship. 56-year old Lachsen Slimani is also obsessed with riding games. He lives with his family on a remote highland plateau in the Middle Atlas. Lachsen is proud because his 18-year old son Mohammed wants to follow in his father’s footsteps. For that he needs his own horse, so the tradition goes. Lachsen wants to fulfil this dream for his son. So, in order to get the money together for the horse, he takes off on an adventure and is travelling to...

programme.title: Under the Spell of Horses
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Under the Spell of the Horses - Iceland
programme.desc: Iceland, the island of longing in the North. The biggest volcanic island in the world is known for its grandiose landscape, for its geysers and glaciers. But it is even more famous for its horses. Icelandic horses are considered the liveliest horses in the whole of Europe with the greatest stamina. They tolt over mossy banks and lava rock unfazed by rivers, glaciers and scree slopes. In Nordic mythology the steed are never far behind the warriors. Where would Siefgried be without his horse Grani, or Odin without Sleipnir. Even the sun wouldn’t rise or set if “awake early” and “very quick” weren’t pulling their chariot. From the beginning of colonisation, the Icelanders had the kind of...

programme.title: Under the Spell of Horses
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Under the Spell of the Horses - India
programme.desc: Proud elegance, silky-shiny coats and a graceful, powerful physique – the supreme Marwari horses have been worshipped in India as magical creatures for thousands of years. People say they descended directly from the Gods, that once when the Gods were sitting round the fire, there was so much soot that one of the Gods had to cry. One of the tears from his right eye changed into a stallion, and one of his tears from the left eye produced a mare. Ever since, the people in Rajasthan have believed that horses are Gods. Maharaja – palaces, temples and citadels, women in colourful saris and men with bright turbans – the land of the Rajas, the king’s sons, arouse fantasies reminiscent of One...

programme.title: Wild Prairie Man
programme.desc: Located in the Northern Great Plains of Canada, Grasslands National Park has been a 20 year odyssey for wildlife photographer James R. Page. For James, critters are more interesting than people and he shares some of his iconic images and experiences from this endangered ecosystem. We showcase the parks wilderness that is dominated by prairie light and dark sky, the wildlife, prairie dogs, mesmerizing landscapes, and bisons. We immerse ourselves in the wild habitat of Grasslands National Park for over a year capturing some never before scenes in the Wild Prairie. James R. Pages connection to the land and the wildlife provides an unforgettable journey into the heart of this endangered...

programme.title: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: The wings of cliff swallows in Nebraska are getting shorter – while female turtles in Chesapeake Bay are getting larger. On the Galapagos Islands, two species of finches are developing back into one. Increasing numbers of peregrine falcons are living in urban areas – and have adapted their behaviour: thanks to the city lights, they have learned to hunt at night.

programme.title: The Cape of Wild Animals, Episode 5
programme.desc: The movie focuses on committed animal rights activists, who fight for the lives of their charges every day, in diverse protection projects and rescue centres along the South African Garden Route.

programme.title: Rewilding: Back to Nature
programme.desc: Worldwide, there are various projects and approaches to give nature more space again. The aim is to create larger wilderness areas that develop with hardly any influence of humans - by reintroducing so-called key animal species and creating a network of wilderness corridors across entire continents. Rewilding promises to be a cost-effective form of conservation in which we can boost biodiversity and protect the climate.

programme.title: Dust And Stripes
programme.desc: In a never-ending quest for grass and water, the striped herds undertake an annual epic trek across the vast lunar landscape of the Kalahari’s Makgadikgadi Pans. Most of the year, the Makgadikgadi is an inhospitable wasteland of windswept, salt-encrusted pans. For the area’s water-dependent zebra, the Boteti River on the western edge of the pans is a dry-season lifeline. However, it is also a death trap, with lions waiting in ambush and crocodiles lurking in dark riverside caves.

programme.title: Missing Butterflies
programme.desc: Its miraculous transformation from caterpillar to remarkable winged beauty has been a point of constant intrigue. However, in the last few years, many have observed a decrease in the butterfly population. A much-discussed topic in the entomological society is the decline of the insect populace, but to what extent is this topic relevant to our beloved butterflies? For years, a teacher from lower Bavaria and a biologist from Munich have dedicated themselves to studying the butterfly and their presence in Bavaria. The results of their studies tell an enlightening story that is sure to entertain.

programme.title: Children of the Sun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Children of the Sun - Butterflies
programme.desc: Butterflies surely are the most fancied species inside the insect world. Their beautiful colouring and their graceful flight appeal to everyone. There are close to 4000 types of Butterflies – today many of them are endangered due to the loss of their habitat.

programme.title: Children of the Sun
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Children of the Sun - Wild Bees
programme.desc: Most people associate honey producing insects with the name “BEE“. Few realize that there are over 560 different species of bees - most of them live their lives “busy as a bee“ but some “abuse“ other insects and others are even known to be murderers. The film “Wild Bees” shows the incredible diversity and the stunning adaptations of our “BEES” to various habitats and diverse living conditions. Fascinating fights, sensational performances, imposing structures and colorful individuals – the world of “Wild Bees” offers all of this and more.

programme.title: Hummingbirds: Jewelled Messengers
programme.desc: Hummingbirds live at the limits of what is possible. They have the highest metabolism with a heart rate of 1,200 beats per minute of any vertebrate. Their wings beat 50 times a second. They can hover on the spot, and even fly backwards. To our eyes, they are just a blur. But with the aid of high-speed cameras we can slow down their hyperactive lives and look into their secret world.

programme.title: The Secret of Migrating Birds - Tryst at the Red Sea
programme.desc: Each year in spring, Israel witnesses a unique spectacle. Many millions of migrating birds cross the land bridge between Africa, Asia and Europe.Their first major roosting place after an exhausting nonstop flight over the African deserts is in southern Israel – a vital stopover. Here they replenish their energy reserves. The flocks of migrating birds are pursued by flocks of ornithologists. Hundreds of birders flood into the port city of Eilat on the Red Sea to take part in the Migration Festival. For a week, Israels southernmost coastal resort is home to international scientists and amateur birders.

programme.title: King of the Seas - Sea Eagle
programme.desc: The times where eagles have been seen as varmints are over. They are now perceived as an integral part of the food cycle. Due to the fact that the habitats of the sea eagles in Germany are largely found in the north-eastern regions that are rich in water, the movie accompanies the eagles to an island, home to hundreds of sea ravens, where they rob the baby sea ravens of their food. They seem to always profit from the successes of the fellow creatures in their habitats. This film introduces you to the expert poachers of the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Under the Spell of Horses
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Under the Spell of the Horses - Morocco
programme.desc: Once a year the royal city of Meknes is transformed into an oriental camp. Two thousand curious onlookers gather round the square. More than five hundred riders are expected to take part in this major Fantasia, a warlike display of horsemanship. 56-year old Lachsen Slimani is also obsessed with riding games. He lives with his family on a remote highland plateau in the Middle Atlas. Lachsen is proud because his 18-year old son Mohammed wants to follow in his father’s footsteps. For that he needs his own horse, so the tradition goes. Lachsen wants to fulfil this dream for his son. So, in order to get the money together for the horse, he takes off on an adventure and is travelling to...

programme.title: Under the Spell of Horses
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Under the Spell of the Horses - Iceland
programme.desc: Iceland, the island of longing in the North. The biggest volcanic island in the world is known for its grandiose landscape, for its geysers and glaciers. But it is even more famous for its horses. Icelandic horses are considered the liveliest horses in the whole of Europe with the greatest stamina. They tolt over mossy banks and lava rock unfazed by rivers, glaciers and scree slopes. In Nordic mythology the steed are never far behind the warriors. Where would Siefgried be without his horse Grani, or Odin without Sleipnir. Even the sun wouldn’t rise or set if “awake early” and “very quick” weren’t pulling their chariot. From the beginning of colonisation, the Icelanders had the kind of...

programme.title: Under the Spell of Horses
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Under the Spell of the Horses - India
programme.desc: Proud elegance, silky-shiny coats and a graceful, powerful physique – the supreme Marwari horses have been worshipped in India as magical creatures for thousands of years. People say they descended directly from the Gods, that once when the Gods were sitting round the fire, there was so much soot that one of the Gods had to cry. One of the tears from his right eye changed into a stallion, and one of his tears from the left eye produced a mare. Ever since, the people in Rajasthan have believed that horses are Gods. Maharaja – palaces, temples and citadels, women in colourful saris and men with bright turbans – the land of the Rajas, the king’s sons, arouse fantasies reminiscent of One...

programme.title: Wild Prairie Man
programme.desc: Located in the Northern Great Plains of Canada, Grasslands National Park has been a 20 year odyssey for wildlife photographer James R. Page. For James, critters are more interesting than people and he shares some of his iconic images and experiences from this endangered ecosystem. We showcase the parks wilderness that is dominated by prairie light and dark sky, the wildlife, prairie dogs, mesmerizing landscapes, and bisons. We immerse ourselves in the wild habitat of Grasslands National Park for over a year capturing some never before scenes in the Wild Prairie. James R. Pages connection to the land and the wildlife provides an unforgettable journey into the heart of this endangered...

programme.title: Unnatural Selection
programme.desc: The wings of cliff swallows in Nebraska are getting shorter – while female turtles in Chesapeake Bay are getting larger. On the Galapagos Islands, two species of finches are developing back into one. Increasing numbers of peregrine falcons are living in urban areas – and have adapted their behaviour: thanks to the city lights, they have learned to hunt at night.

programme.title: mareTV: Curacao, Blue Wonder of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Curacao is one of the most popular attractions for countless cruise ships on their trips through the Caribbean, because it is located outside of the hurricane belt. This is why Eric Miguel is constantly in action. He is the bridge keeper of the Queen Emma Bridge, the landmark of Curacaos capital, Willemstad. After his shift, Eric goes to Yvonne Troemans cook-shop. Her speciality is Kadushi, a cactus soup. The ingredients include cactus flesh, pigtails, mussels and a few secret "treats". Barbara van Bebber is the only submarine pilot on Curacao and literally gets to the bottom of things amidst the turquoise-blue wonder of the Caribbean. She charters out her sub to marine biologists and...

programme.title: Caribbean sisters: The Lesser Antilles St. Kitts and Nevis
programme.desc: In the centre of the Caribbean, volcanoes rise steeply from the sea, thus shaping the sister islands of St. Kitts and Nevis. Their slopes, covered in lush rainforests, snow-white, sandy beaches and the surrounding tur-quoise tinted waters provide the ultimate setting for this record-breaking, albeit tiny island paradise: Both islets are the smallest of the Caribbean dwarf states and also rank among the world’s ten smallest states. A hot pepper sauce, made of a creative mixture of ginger, garlic, thyme and extraordinarily hot chillies that thrive in the hot and humid climate of Nevis, is simmering on the stove of Violet and Llewellyn’s house. Lemmy Pemberton digs up abandoned turtle nests...

programme.title: glCuba - Brilliantly Caribbean
programme.desc: Even anyone who has not yet been to Cuba can conjure up certain images of American vintage street cruisers, imposing buildings that have seen better days, white sandy beaches full of palms and loving couples on the Malecon against a backdrop of crashing waves. This island is somewhat of a myth and its people generate a special joie de vivre. The legendary Hershey Train departs for Matanzas from the capital, Havana. On the oldest electrified railway line in the Caribbean, 60-year-old Spanish carriages make their way along al-most 100 kilometres of coastline in the most relaxed way possible. The Salvavidas on Varadero, probably the most famous beach on the island, have a particular-ly...

programme.title: mareTV: The Caribbean for explorers: St. Vincent and the Grenadines
programme.desc: Much more Caribbean than on the islands of St. Vincent and the Grenadines is hardly possible. Deserted beaches, uninhabited islands, lush vegetation, the 33 islands in total are dreamlike with extremely hospitable inhabitants. Miranda Phillips runs a laundry and water boat on Bequia. Every morning, the 32-year-old navigates from yacht to yacht with her small bright green service vehicle and is already expected by most skippers. Miranda promises radiantly fresh laundry, which she delivers again the same day. And so there is always something going on in her tiny laundrette in the harbour. It turns into a karaoke bar in the evening, because that is Mirandas great passion. Eban Olliver has...

programme.title: mareTV: Peru - Coast of the Incas
programme.desc: Dramatically, the coast plunges into the sea, the so-called Costa of Peru is a gigantic desert on the Pacific Ocean, 2,400 kilometers long. Rugged, bizarre, like from another star. Ancient cultures settled here, the Moche and the Chimú. Later the proud Inca, the self-proclaimed royal people of the Andes, ruled. In the small town of Huanchaco in northern Peru, the fishermen build a new boat every month: from reed. The small ships are called Caballito de Totora (reed horses), because the shape is reminiscent of a horse and the fishermen ride in it kneeling in the waves. About 2,000 years ago, the moche used it to go out to sea. Carlos Segura Azola is a descendant of the moche. He is...

programme.title: The Heart of Hawaii - The Island of Oahu
programme.desc: The Oahu island is the economic and cultural centre of the Hawaiian archipelago, as well as being a paradise for surfers, active holidaymakers and freedom lovers. The island is home to more than half of all natives and almost eight million foreign guests annually. Anyone searching for peace and seclusion won’t find either in Honolulu or Waikiki. Traffic congestion and a backdrop of skyscrapers belong to the town panorama. Hip cafes, galleries and young fashion firms have settled here, adding a new and modern flair to the capital. Cindy’s Lei Shoppe, the Chinatown florists, has been here for more than 30 years. This is also because the so-called Leis, the tradition of floral decoration,...

programme.title: mareTV: In Alaskas Fjord World
programme.desc: Gigantic fjords and over 5,000 small islands: In Alaskas south theres a lot of wilderness and little civilization. The region between the capital Juneau and the Canadian border is also known by locals as the "Last Frontier", the last outpost. Michelle Masden, for example, has come to terms with the harsh conditions here. She is the only seaplane pilot in the region. She earns her living with her 65-year-old Beaver: as an air taxi, transport plane and now and then as a rescuer in last necessity. Michelle flies anything and everything: spare parts and food, doctors, hikers and hunters. For the fishermen of southern Alaska she searches for large shoals of fish and guides the captains to...

programme.title: mareTV: Newfoundland - Canadas Eastern Point
programme.desc: In Newfoundland, at the easternmost tip of North America, the landscape is pristine, dramatic, and very sparsely populated. In summer, icebergs occasionally drift along the steep cliffs. When the "Titanic" collided with an iceberg and sank just 300 miles off the coast of Newfoundland in 1912, the last radio messages were picked up in a small wooden hut on the Avalon Peninsula. Today, most Newfoundlanders live on Avalon. There are particularly many seabirds here. In Witless Bay, the newborn puffins are ready for their first descent into the Atlantic. But some stray onto the coastal road, attracted by the lights of the hotels and restaurants. In doing so, they run the risk of being run...

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The U.S. East Coast, The City and the Sea
programme.desc: The journey up the coast continues through Delaware to suburban New Jersey, and onwards into the heart of Manhattan. In Delaware, famous as a corporate tax haven, we visit a winery. In New York City we zip around with a bicycle courier and then head out to Long Island for oysters.

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The U.S. East Coast, Florida - The Sunshine State
programme.desc: Nowhere is the American way of life as relaxed as on Floridas beaches. The Keys, a chain of islands at the far southern end of the state, reveal a more laid-back side of the USA. But all of Florida amazes -- with secluded beaches, unspoiled nature, and the legacy of the early European settlers.

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The U.S. East Coast, The Heart of New England
programme.desc: From New York, the journey up the coast leads into the heart of New England. We visit Yale; spend some time in the 19th century mansions at Newport, RI; tour the coastal fishing and vacation towns of Massachusetts, and then meet a modern entrepreneur in Boston and see her rooftop gardens.

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The U.S. East Coast, Surf And Turf
programme.desc: New Hampshire has only 19 kilometers of coastline and short summers, all the more reason Shauna Fraser takes every opportunity to be by the sea. In the sheltered harbor of Rye, Shauna also targets inner attitude with yoga on a paddleboard.

programme.title: The U.S. East Coast
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The U.S. East Coast, The Southern States
programme.desc: We travel from Georgia through the Carolinas to Virginia, ending near Washington, DC. Along the way we meet a Georgia farmer; talk to painter J. Chris Wilson in Charleston; sail along the Outer Banks of Carolina, and visit rural Virginia, experiencing life in the beautiful southern states.

programme.title: mareTV: Mexicos Caribbean Coast
programme.desc: The palm tree laden beaches on Mexicos Riviera Maya on the Yucatan peninsula are endless, and the turquoise sea with its gentle Caribbean surf is a warm 25 degrees during the mild winter in this part of the world. Between Cancún and Punta Allen, where once there was little more than bushland and a few sleepy fishing villages, vibrant life has evolved during the past three decades. Richard Sowa has lived on a floating island for the past 15 years: an island he built himself out of empty plastic bottles. The bon vivant him-self sees it as a "solution for our planets refuse problem". Off Punta Allen, a village in the bay of Sian Kaan, Mexican Mara Coral Ley and her cousin Kim, continue to...

programme.title: mareTV: Martinique
programme.desc: The island of Martinique is a piece of France in the Caribbean, between Florida and South America. And of course, Savoir-vivre applies just as it does on the other side of the Atlantic, between the English Channel and the Mediterranean. Jacky Pascault is the first and only man to cultivate mushrooms in the Caribbean. Everywhere else, they grow on artificially fertilised soil, but Jackys Champignons Tropicaux flourish on sugar cane fibres. Nicole Vilo tailors hats and dresses out of coconut palms. Of course, the catwalk for the models wearing her first collection is one of the countless dream beaches. The Martiniquais sail on boats they call Yole, which have no keel and are therefore...

programme.title: mareTV: Curacao, Blue Wonder of the Caribbean
programme.desc: Curacao is one of the most popular attractions for countless cruise ships on their trips through the Caribbean, because it is located outside of the hurricane belt. This is why Eric Miguel is constantly in action. He is the bridge keeper of the Queen Emma Bridge, the landmark of Curacaos capital, Willemstad. Barbara van Bebber is the only submarine pilot on Curacao and literally gets to the bottom of things amidst the turquoise-blue wonder of the Caribbean. She charters out her sub to marine biologists and...

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Wildlife Nannies: Eagles, Owls and Hawks
programme.desc: There are eagles, owls and hawks that need individual care at Fawn Wildlife Haven Rehab, Odessa.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Wildlife Nannies: Baby Alarm!
programme.desc: Baby alarm at Wildpark Daun: Monkeys, emus, and a little lamb are all brought into the world.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Wildlife Nannies: 25 Orphaned Opossums
programme.desc: A San Diego resident Pam Norman shares her home with her husband, her two dogs and 25 orphaned opossums.

programme.title: Wildlife Nannies
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Wildlife Nannies: Grizzly Bears
programme.desc: Grizzly Bears are one of the feature attractions of Grouse Mountain Refuge for Endangered Wildlife, Vancouver.

programme.title: I Got a Monster: Americas Most Corrupt Police Squad
programme.desc: Retells in highly dramatic fashion one of the USAs biggest police corruption scandals. In 2017, Baltimore was rocked by the Federal indictment of Wayne Jenkins, a highly decorated supercop and leader of the Baltimore Police Departments elite Gun Trace Task Force along with six other members on racketeering charges.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: Racism in Uniform: The defense takes dead aim at Detective Mark Fuhrmans troubled history with African-Americans.

programme.title: OJ25
programme.desc: Things That Go Bump In The Night: Kato Kaelin, O.J.s off-beat friend and house guest delivers testimony about the night of the murders.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E41 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.desc: Some called it a love affair. Others, a crime. The shocking story that 34-year-old married schoolteacher and mom Mary Kay Letourneau was having sex with a 12-year-old student grabbed headlines around the world.

programme.title: Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield
programme.sub-title: S01 : E42 Judgment With Ashleigh Banfield

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: In 2001, there are a series of murders of homeless people in Toronto.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: An angel of mercy turns out to be an angel of death when the number of deaths in an Indiana Intensive Care Unit skyrockets.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: A cunning arsonist stays one step ahead of the police and terrifies a small farming community until behavioural profiling help detectives zero in on a very unlikely suspect.

programme.title: 72 Hours: True Crime
programme.desc: In 1998, in a normally peaceful suburb, a pervert on a bicycle appears, performing sexual acts on himself and then attacking teenage girls.

programme.desc: The defense attacks the professionalism and thoroughness of criminalist Dennis Fung who collected blood evidence at the crime scene.

programme.desc: Hunter and McCall must track down a killer who has been shooting parolees.

programme.desc: Rick Hunters back. Hes considering marrying his girlfriend. But before he could, she is murdered.

programme.desc: A voodoo priest whose spell has driven an acolyte to murder now threatens Cassy.

programme.sub-title: S08 : E10 Dead Again... And Again
programme.desc: After saving a mystery woman from an attack, Tom is drawn into a plot to kill her wealthy husband.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: During the holiday season, Tony investigates the murder of an elderly woman.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Stella Stevens guest stars as a reclusive former movie queen -- and one of Tonys all-time fim favorites -- who is implicated in the real-life murder of her lover.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: When Nick Colette, the hot-headed son of a "retired" mobster Tommy Colette, joins forces with his father, Eastbridges crime troubles start.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: After he shoots a woman in a drunken domestic squabble, Officer Kelly becomes the victim of a campaign.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Private eye Tony turns his sights on his old department.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Tony suspects foul play when a member of a commando-like squad of elite prep-school students -- perpetrators of a series of break-in thefts -- disappears.

programme.title: The Commish
programme.desc: Tony investigates the death of a wealthy heiress; computerization of the Scalis bank account causes havoc.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Renos latest bounty kidnaps a wealthy Japanese businessmans daughter.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno protects a cynical rock-music star.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.sub-title: S05 : E17 Sex, Lies And Activewear
programme.desc: Reno and Bobby must rescue several kidnapped models. LORENZO LAMAS directed the episode, which guest stars his real-life mother and wife.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: A motivational speaker uses Reno and Bobby to avoid being ruined by his scandalous past.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno is offered a tempting but dangerous option when he finds himself being "recruited" by a dying hit man.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno and Bobby must rely on their maternal instincts when they find a baby left on their doorstep.

programme.title: Renegade
programme.desc: Reno gets kidnapped by an insane woman who wants him to marry her sister.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: The murder of a record producers estranged wife exposes a gangsters money laundering scheme.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 The Queen Is Dead
programme.desc: Chris poses as a beauty pageant judge to find out who brutally murdered the pageants most recent queen.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: A naked body of a well-known congressman washes up near his beach front compound.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: A serial sex killer with a penchant for the personals forces Rita to put herself on the line.

programme.title: Silk Stalkings
programme.desc: Chris and Rita go after a corrupt judge who is trading lenient sentences for sex.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On May 17th 2005, a body is discovered in a forest of Sucy-en-Brie; Christophe Belle, 40 years old, a renowned pastry cook.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The disturbing missing case in Paris of a four year old.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On October 13th 1996, the body of young Angelique Dumetz, 18 years old, is recovered down a ditch in Oise forest. An important clue is found on the crime scene.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On February 23th 2017, policemen are alerted of the disapearrance of Brigitte Troadec, her husband Pascal, and their children Sebastien and Charlotte.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Night of Horror at Devils Plateau (Marie-Jeanne Meyer Case) - On June 18, 2011, Marie-Jeanne Meyer, 17-years old, waved goodbye to her little sister before leaving for her daily jog on the heights of Tournon in Ardèche. She never came back. Three days later, her mutilated body was found in a freshly dug pit, near an area known to be cursed, "The Devils Plateau." Whats more, the crime scene looked like a mystical ritual ... Was it a ritual murder? Revenge? An unfortunate encounter? ...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A Mysterious Murder at the Farm (Valerie Bary Case)- On Friday, March 26, 2004, in the region of Dijon, Laurent Bary came home from his work to discover the lifeless body of his wife, Valerie, bathing in a pool of blood. According to the investigators initial findings, the 38-year-old nurses aid had been stabbed several times, seeming to validate the theory of a robbery gone wrong.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 13, 2011, two boaters retrieved a suitcase that was floating in the bay of Lorient. Inside, they discovered the tied up corpse of a man.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Bloody Christmas next to the Leman lake (CASE OF RUTH LÉGERET) - On January 4, 2006, Ruth Legeret was found dead in the middle of a pool of blood at her luxurious property in Vevey, Switzerland. Next to her was the lifeless body of her friend, Marina Studer. Who could have killed these two simple and wealthy widows? Clue after clue, the Swiss polices investigation would revolve around an environment of family jealousy and financial greed.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: September 16 2005. The lifeless body of Audrey Jouannet, 24, is found hidden under the bed in her small apartment in Soisy-sur-Seine. It soon becomes apparent that the young woman has been tortured at length before being strangled. But surprisingly, though the highly meticulous murderer has taken care to leave no sign of his passage, the autopsy reveals traces of sperm on the victim. It will take all of the investigators intuition to pierce the mystery of this heinous crime...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Sylvain Dromard finds the body of his wife Laurence lying in a pool of blood in the kitchen. The crime was particularly violent and the theory of a burglary that went wrong is soon excluded. But investigators dont understand who could want the adorable hairdresser of Saint-Martin-dAblois dead. During the investigation, the work of profilers will enable them to draw a very precise portrait of the murderer...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: After an ordinary dinner, Pierre and Gabrielle Labrell suffer severe abdominal pains.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Nelly Cremel, 39, leaves her home to go jogging... never to return. Eight days later, after a vast search campaign, her body is found. Theres no doubt that its murder. The case soon ignites public opinion, even inflaming passions at the highest level of the state. The clues lead investigators on a number of trails, from the shadows of the French secret service to a manhunt for a possible sex maniac, in a case of murder most foul.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Willy Pomonti, a retired architect, is found savagely murdered in his opulent villa in La Celle-Saint-Cloud, near Paris. It soon becomes clear that the man has been tortured prior to death. At several points during this extraordinary enquiry, police will feel theyre holding the culprit... It will take them ten years to finally shed light on this particularly violent crime.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The corpse of Priscillia Ciatti, 14, is discovered by the side of a field, a few hundred metres from her family home. The teenager has been stabbed sixty times with a knife and -an extra sordid detail - a devil mask is found next to her body. Was Priscillia the victim of a prowler? A serial killer? A maniac inspired by a horror movie? Investigators soon find that the young girl felt she was being watched, and even threatened...

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: In the early hours of the morning, Mathilde Croguennec, 18, attending "Teknival" in Brittany, is found at the foot of a tree with her throat cut. Investigators face the task of finding the killer from among the 43,000 participants of this huge open-air festival of electronic music, where drink and drugs are consumed in abundance. An unusual investigation that leads the police down a number of false avenues.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: Arriving at her work, the secretary of a small firm in the suburbs of Geneva finds the body of Jean-Raymond Blatti, the companys new accountant. The man is lying in a pool of blood and, on his belly, the murderer has written "DIRTY RAPIST". Yet Jean-Raymond Blatti was never charged with sexual assault. Over the course of the investigation, this inscription will appear as one of the many mysteries of this case which is particularly rich in twists and turns.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On July 19th 2004, the naked and tied up body of a woman is recovered in the Ourcq canal in Fresnes-sur-Marne. The victim is impossible to identify.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: On April 3th 2003, Chantal Ternik, a 48 year old housewife, is discovered hanged in her house of Sanary-sur-Mer, in Var.

programme.desc: On March 28th 2013, the burnt body of Anne Barbot, 38 years old, is discovered in a forest of Maine-et-Loire.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers

programme.title: Supersonic Flight
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: In this episode, we feature a 1965 Jaguar E-Type Coupe, a 1956 Austin-Healey 100/4 BN2 Le Mans, and a 1953 Fiat 8V Supersonic.

programme.title: From Paris to Monte Carlo
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: Relive the glamorous past of a Ferrari Lusso as it went from Paris to Monte Carlo. We’ll see what it’s worth at the Gooding and Company Auction in Scottsdale, AZ.

programme.title: Nifty Fifties
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: From cars that make a Mini look big to a land yacht of American steel. We’ll see what the fifties are worth at Gooding and Company in Scottsdale, Arizona.

programme.title: Travelin In Style
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: The cruisers of your dreams, the cars that still turn heads. We highlight a 37 MG SA Tourer, a 36 Ford Station Wagon, and a 41 Cadillac Series 62 Convertible Sedan.

programme.title: Snake in the Barn
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: Along with a 1966 Ford Galaxie 7-Litre and a 1967 Land Rover NADA Series II A, they’ll be taking a look at what is possibly the last barn find Cobra in existence.

programme.title: Master the Hawk
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: It’s a flashback to the great cruisers of the 50s on What’s My Car Worth? Keith Martin and Bill Stephens will take us across the block at Auctions America in Florida.

programme.title: The Adventurers Adventure
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: The What’s My Car Worth crew is back in Fort Lauderdale at Auctions America and they’ve found a 1974 Pontiac Trans Am, and one of the nicest Austin Healeys around.

programme.title: Racing Across the Block
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: A ’69 Copo Camaro joins a ’65 Corvette for a study in Chevrolet racing heritage and shows what they’re really worth today.

programme.title: Cruising in Style
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: A 1949 Jaguar XK120 leads the way. An Oldsmobile 442 and its older sibling, the Super 88 convertible, round out the action at Gooding and Company.

programme.title: Priciest Rides
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: A look at a 1939 Alfa Romeo 8C 2900B and a quick trip to Amelia Island brings an original Cobra, a ‘56 Chevy Bel Air Nomad and a record-setting Alfa for sale.

programme.title: Best of the Best
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: A look at at a Talbot-Lago 150C SS shows us the best of the best in the collector car world. We find a classic Buick, the AC Aceca, and even a Harley-Davidson.

programme.title: Victory Circle
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: What’s My Car Worth invades the Charlotte Motor Speedway with dealers and auction reps, putting money on the table and buying cars on camera.

programme.title: Cruisin the Speedway
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Whats My Car Worth?
programme.desc: Collector car dealers and auction reps join in the fun, trying to get the keys to a ’64 Ford Galaxie, a Chevy Bel-Air and a very special Pontiac wagon.

programme.title: Rats
programme.desc: New York is known as one of the rattiest cities in America with an estimated population of close to 2 million rodents. Here is how New York City rats out its rodents.

programme.title: Taxis
programme.desc: The yellow taxi cab is the quintessential New York City ride. But today the threat of ride-share apps and city scandal has left cab drivers to face devastating debt.

programme.title: Trash
programme.desc: Many things come to mind when thinking about New York, but how the city deals with its garbage is usually not one of them. Here is how the city hauls away its trash.

programme.title: Sewage
programme.desc: New Yorkers create, on average, 1.3 billion gallons of wastewater per day that makes its way through 7,500 miles of pipes that make up the citys sewer system.

programme.title: Steam
programme.desc: Many dont know it, but New York is a city that runs on steam. Its one of the few cities that relies on this old technology to heat some of its most famous buildings.

programme.title: Bridges
programme.desc: New York has some of the most iconic bridges. These engineering marvels have helped set the tone for how bridges around the world are designed.

programme.title: Parks
programme.desc: New York City might be known as the concrete jungle, but its nearly 30,000 acres of park space have been an ever-present part of this bustling metropolis.

programme.title: Airports
programme.desc: New York has one of the busiest airspaces in the world. Here is how New Yorks airports have evolved to handle 140 million passengers each year.

programme.title: Electricity
programme.desc: Keeping the lights on in New York City is no easy task and as New York moves towards a greener future how we generate electricity will have to evolve.

programme.title: Water
programme.desc: Getting water from upstate reservoirs to the taps of over 8.5 million people in New York City is no easy feat.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Tigers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Siberian tigers are the largest of all cats. Over the last century, theyve experienced an almost total population crash, and at least 97% of those tigers have gone.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Snow Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Often referred to as the gray ghost or ghost of the mountains, this animals rarity and elusiveness was legendary.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Pumas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: These cats are much more closely related to cheetahs than lions. While pumas are often found in mountains, theyre also found in the lowlands, dense forests, or deserts.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Lions
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: There are now thought to be fewer than 15,000 lions remaining in Kenyas Masai Mara, a drop of 75% in 50 years.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: The leopard is a master of secrecy. Its one of the hardest of all big cats to see, let alone observe. Mainly because leopards need absolute invisibility to hunt.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Jaguars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: The first jaguar scientists struggled to go anywhere near their subjects. But times have changed.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Cheetahs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: First, cheetahs are daytime hunters with eyesight optimized for open landscape and distant prey. Second, theyre possibly the fastest land animals that have ever lived.

programme.title: Great White Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to South Africa, one of the worlds great shark hot spots, as Andy Casagrande observes the iconic great white shark and its behavior when hunting fur seals.

programme.title: Hammerhead Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to the Bahamas as Andy Casagrande attempts to place a fin camera on the elusive hammerhead shark… what could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Tiger Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmaker Andy Casagrande travels off the coast of North Carolina to document never before seen behavior of one of the most misunderstood sharks in the world.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats

programme.desc: Travel to South Africa, one of the worlds great shark hot spots, as Andy Casagrande observes the iconic great white shark and its behavior when hunting fur seals.

programme.title: Hammerhead Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Travel to the Bahamas as Andy Casagrande attempts to place a fin camera on the elusive hammerhead shark… what could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Tiger Shark
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives of Sharks
programme.desc: Wildlife filmmaker Andy Casagrande travels off the coast of North Carolina to document never before seen behavior of one of the most misunderstood sharks in the world.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Tigers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Siberian tigers are the largest of all cats. Over the last century, theyve experienced an almost total population crash, and at least 97% of those tigers have gone.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Snow Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: Often referred to as the gray ghost or ghost of the mountains, this animals rarity and elusiveness was legendary.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Pumas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: These cats are much more closely related to cheetahs than lions. While pumas are often found in mountains, theyre also found in the lowlands, dense forests, or deserts.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Lions
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: There are now thought to be fewer than 15,000 lions remaining in Kenyas Masai Mara, a drop of 75% in 50 years.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Leopards
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: The leopard is a master of secrecy. Its one of the hardest of all big cats to see, let alone observe. Mainly because leopards need absolute invisibility to hunt.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Jaguars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: The first jaguar scientists struggled to go anywhere near their subjects. But times have changed.

programme.title: The Secret Lives Of Cheetahs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Secret Lives Of Big Cats
programme.desc: First, cheetahs are daytime hunters with eyesight optimized for open landscape and distant prey. Second, theyre possibly the fastest land animals that have ever lived.

programme.title: The Bermondsey Horror
programme.desc: In 1849, a man suddenly disappeared in Bermondsey. The discovery that he had been brutally murdered enraptured the press and the public.

programme.title: In The Shadow Of Jack
programme.desc: At the time of Jack The Ripper, London was home to some of the most terrible individuals the city has ever seen. One of the very worst was the elusive Borough Poisoner.

programme.title: Finding Dr. Crippen
programme.desc: Having killed his wife and buried her in the basement, Dr. Crippen believed he had escaped on a ship to Canada. But the police managed to hunt him down.

programme.title: The Brides In The Bath Killer
programme.desc: George Smith had many aliases. He needed them for his many wives who he would soon murder in order to claim the inheritance.

programme.title: Terror In The Roaring Twenties
programme.desc: Edith Thompson and Frederick Bywaters were in love. But the young couple was convicted for murdering her husband in a case that shocked society and fascinated Hitchcock.

programme.title: The Blackout Ripper
programme.desc: It was WWII and London was rocked by the Blitz from the planes flying above. But down on the streets below another terrible danger lurked in the shadows.

programme.title: Hitlers Dealer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: Munich, 2013 a giant haul of missing masterpieces were found. Gurlitt was the man behind it. His fathers job was to purchase works for Hitler for the Fuhrermuseum.

programme.title: Faberge Eggs
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: Each year Carl Faberge made one of a kind Easter egg for the Tsars family. When Carl fled Russia during the revolution, 8 of these priceless Imperial Eggs went missing.

programme.title: Vincent Van Gogh
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: When Van Gogh died, he was a complete unknown, his paintings fetching under 10 dollars. So how did his works become some of the most revered and expensive in the world?

programme.title: Monuments Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: During WWII the Nazis plundered some of the worlds greatest artworks as they tore across Europe. We find out how the Allies tracked them down.

programme.title: Leonardo da Vinci
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: The story of the theft of the Mona Lisa in 1911 from the Louvre and how Pablo Picasso was accused of the crime.

programme.title: Vermeer
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Raider Of The Lost Art
programme.desc: The Dutch didnt appreciate what they had. For 200 years Vermeer was completely forgotten.

programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Dr. G: Medical Examiner

programme.title: Camp X-Ray
programme.desc: Camp X-Ray kertoo nuoresta naisesta, joka liittyy Yhdysvaltain armeijaan ollakseen osa jotain itseaan ja pikkukaupunkinsa juuria suurempaa. Han paatyy kuitenkin vartijaksi Guantanamo Bayhin, missa han solmii ystavyyssuhteen yhden vangin kanssa. Eettisia kysymyksia pohtiessaan naiden kahden eri lahtokohdista tulleen ihmisen ystavyys muuttaa heidan molempien elaman.

programme.title: Zalava
programme.desc: Vuonna 1978 Zalavan syrjaisen vuoristokylan asukkaat ovat kauhuissaan nakymattoman vaaran edessa. He vaittavat, etta heidan kylaansa riivaa demoni ja palkkaavat manaajan ajamaan hengen pois. Mutta kun nuori kersantti Massoud pidattaa manaajan petoksesta, tilanne muuttuu.

programme.title: Gringa
programme.desc: Ongelmia kokenut teinitytto lahtee Meksikoon etsimaan isaansa, jota han ei edes tunne. He opettelevat yhdessa olemaan perhe, vaikka ensin heita yhdistavat vain menetykset.

programme.title: Viimeinen vuoro
programme.desc: Tom Harper (Timothy Spall) lahtee pitkalle bussimatkalle Skotlannin pohjoisimmasta kolkasta synnyinseuduilleen Englannin etelarannikon Lands Endiin. Paikallisbussien aikatauluja, omaa ikaansa ja kohtaloa uhmaten han tekee kaikkensa pitaakseen vaimolleen antamansa lupauksen. Matkasta tulee muistorikas seikkailuretki taynna kaanteita ja yllatyksia. VIIMEINEN VUORO on elokuva rakkaudesta, menetyksesta ja ihmisen luonteikkaasta periksiantamattomuudesta.

programme.title: The Shamrock Spitfire
programme.desc: Tositarina irlantilaisesta havittajalentaja Brendan ”Paddy” Finucanesta, josta vain 21-vuotiaana tuli Royal Air Forcen nuorin laivueenkomentaja ja yksi toisen maailmansodan suurimmista ja palkituimmista havittaja-assista.

programme.title: Brain On Fire
programme.desc: Susannah Cahalan on hiljattain valmistunut yliopistosta ja elaa unelmaelamaa New Yorkissa. Han on lupaava toimittaja New York Postin toimituksessa ja rakastunut muusikko Stepheniin. Lisaksi esimies on antanut hanelle toimeksiannon, joka mahdollistaa uran lapilyonnin, joten kaikki on kohdallaan. Pian asiat alkavat kuitenkin luisua kasista. Susannah sairastuu sitkeaan flunssaan, unohtaa asioita ja myohastyy aikatauluistaan. Han kuulee ihmisten puhuvan selkansa takana, on varma, etta Stephen tapailee toista naista eika pysty hallitsemaan kehoaan. Ja tilanne pahenee; Susannah alkaa saada voimakkaita kohtauksia ja hanen yha psykoottisemmaksi kayva kaytoksensa vaatii jatkuvaa valvontaa.

programme.title: Fast Girls
programme.desc: Kun teravakielinen katujen kasvatti Shania (Lenora Crichlow) kohtaa kunnianhimoisen, keskiluokkaisen Lisan (Lily James), heidan erilaiset maailmansa tormaavat pikajuoksuradalla lahes tuhoisin seurauksin. Elokuvan “FAST GIRLS” paahenkiloiden haaveena on edustaa maataan yleisurheilun MM-kisoissa. Matka sinne on dramaattinen, raastava ja inspiroiva.

programme.title: The Honor List
programme.desc: Kolme entista bestista tapaavat jalleen, kun ryhman neljas jasen kuolee yllattaen high schoolin viimeisella luokalla. He paattavat suorittaa veivilistan, jonka he tekivat fuksivuonna ollessaan viela laheisia.

programme.title: From Time to Time
programme.desc: Kummittava aavetarina, joka kattaa kaksi maailmaa, yli vuosisadan erolla. Kun 13-vuotias Tolly saa selville, etta han voi salaperaisesti matkustaa naiden kahden valilla, han aloittaa seikkailun, joka paljastaa sukupolvien ajan haudatut perheen salaisuudet.

programme.title: Klaani - tarina Sammakoiden suvusta
programme.desc: Klaani on rikollissuvun tarina, jossa Mika Kaurismaki kasittelee perinteisen eeppisen muodon valityksella olemassaolon ehtoja, lain oikean ja vaaran puolen hailyvalla rajalla. Sammakoitten perheen nuorin poika Aleksanteri on sukunsa valkoinen lammas. Hanen toivotaan pysyvan kaidalla tiella, toisin kuin isansa ja muut suvun miehet. Mutta perhe on pahin ja veri on vetta sakeampaa.. Perhedraama Klaani on upea kunnianosoitus vanhalle Suomi-filmille. Paaosissa nahdaan Markku Halme ja Minna Soisalo ja sivuroolit vilisevat lukuisia huippunayttelijoita: Lasse Poysti, Juhani Niemela, Antti Litja, Kari Vaananen, Soli Labbart.

programme.title: Griffin and Phoenix
programme.desc: Kun Griffin saa kuulla, etta hanella on kuolemaan johtava sairaus, han paattaa ottaa kohtalonsa omiin kasiinsa ja elaa taysilla loppuun asti. Han tapaa Phoenixin ja aikaa myoten rakastuu tahan, mutta myos Phoenixilla on salaisuus...

programme.title: Evil Stepmom
programme.desc: Kun kaksoset haluavat auttaa isaansa deittailemaan uudelleen, he luovat hanelle profiilin deittisivustolle. Vastauksen saaminen ei kesta kauan. Toinen kaksostytoista ystavystyy uuden naisystavan tyttaren kanssa, mutta han tajuaa pian, ettei kaikki ole kohdallaan. Mutta miten han saa vasta rakastuneen isansa huomaamaan asian vakavuuden?

programme.title: Zalava
programme.desc: Vuonna 1978 Zalavan syrjaisen vuoristokylan asukkaat ovat kauhuissaan nakymattoman vaaran edessa. He vaittavat, etta heidan kylaansa riivaa demoni ja palkkaavat manaajan ajamaan hengen pois. Mutta kun nuori kersantti Massoud pidattaa manaajan petoksesta, tilanne muuttuu.

programme.title: Undergods
programme.desc: Mustalla huumorilla viimeistelty scifidystopia maailmasta, jossa vain harva on selvinnyt ja selviytyjistakin jokainen on omalla tavallaan vahan rikki. Kafkamainen miljoo yhdistettyna 2020-luvun romahtaneisiin unelmiin saa jo itsessaan katsojan ihon kananlihalle. Elokuva alkaa, kun kaksi ruumiinkeraajaa kiertelee pitkin autioituneita katuja ja kertoilee tyonsa lomassa romuttuneista haaveistaan, jotka ajoivat heidat tahan kolkkoon nykyhetkeen.

programme.title: Amores Perros
programme.desc: Kauhea auto-onnettomuus yhdistaa kolme tarinaa, joista jokaisessa on mukana hahmoja, jotka kasittelevat menetysta, katumusta ja elaman ankaraa todellisuutta, kaikki rakkauden nimissa.

programme.title: Teen Spirit
programme.desc: Rikkinaisessa perheessa kasvanut 17-vuotias Violet (Fanning) unelmoi pop-tahteydesta ja paosta pienesta englantilaisesta kotikylastaan. Toivoa hanelle tuo kansallinen laulukilpailu Teen Spirit ja epatavallinen mentori, joka opettaa hanta laulamaan sydamestaan. Tie menestykseen on kuitenkin taynna vaaroja ja houkutuksia. Violetin on voitettava epavarmuutensa uskaltaakseen olla oma itsensa ja paastakseen lopulta loistamaan.

programme.title: The Dresser
programme.desc: Eraana kohtalokkaana iltana pienessa englantilaisessa paikallisteatterissa toisen maailmansodan aikana joukko kiertavia nayttelijoita esittaa Shakespearen naytelman "Kuningas Lear".

programme.title: The Architect
programme.desc: Arkkitehti Leo Watersin avioliitto saroilee. Hanen vaimonsa Julia ei ole onnellinen, ja heidan poikansa Martin jattaa opiskelut kesken ja palaa kotiinsa eksyneena, eika oikein onnistu loytamaan yhteista savelta Leon kanssa. Christinatyttarella on murrosika kaynnissa kaikkine vartalossa ja tunteissa tapahtuvine muutoksineen. Kuvaan astuu Tonya Neely, poliittinen aktivisti joka asuu Leon monta vuotta sitten suunnittelemassa kerrostalossa.

programme.title: Shattered Glass
programme.desc: Hayden Christensen nayttelee tassa kriitikoiden ylistamassa tarinassa hapaistysta toimittajasta, jonka on ohjannut ja kirjoittanut Billy Ray, CAPTAIN PHILLIPSISTÄ Oscar-ehdokkuuden saanut kirjoittaja. Kun kuuluisa toimittaja Stephen Glass (Christensen) joutuuu Forbes.com toimittajan (Steve Zahn) tutkinnan alle, paljastuu etta Glass on keksinyt monet hanen tunnetuimmista tarinoista, joka johtaa hanen tuhoonsa tassa mukaansatempaavassa, tositarinassa.

programme.title: The Rum Diary
programme.desc: Hunter S. Thompsonin Rommipaivakirja-romaaniin pohjautuva elokuva seuraa kiertolaiselamaa viettavan reportteri Paul Kempin (Johnny Depp) viinanhuuruista matkaa halki Puerto Ricon pittoreskin saaren. Han on pian omaksunut paikallisvaeston rommiinhukuttautuvan elamantavan, ja tavattuaan hamarabisneksiin sekaantuneen amerikkalaisliikemiehen, Sandersonin (Aaron Eckhart), Paul on myos korviaan myoten retkussa miehen huumaavan kuumaan kihlattuun, Chenaultiin (Amber Heard).

programme.title: The Conversation
programme.desc: Elokuva perustuu tositapahtumaan kahden vaikutusvaltaisen miehen tapaamisesta. Heidan filosofiansa ja nakemyksensa maansa tulevaisuudesta olivat hyvin erilaiset. Eletaan vaarallista aikaa, kun sota Balkanilla oli voitettu, natsit kukistettu ja puna-armeija oli lahella. Miesten valinen keskustelu muokkasi maailmaa.

programme.title: The Truth Commissioner
programme.desc: Totuuskomissaari paljastaa synkkia salaisuuksia Pohjois-Irlannissa, missa valta ja menneisyys tormaavat oikeuden ja sovinnon puolesta.

programme.title: Viimeinen vuoro
programme.desc: Tom Harper (Timothy Spall) lahtee pitkalle bussimatkalle Skotlannin pohjoisimmasta kolkasta synnyinseuduilleen Englannin etelarannikon Lands Endiin. Paikallisbussien aikatauluja, omaa ikaansa ja kohtaloa uhmaten han tekee kaikkensa pitaakseen vaimolleen antamansa lupauksen. Matkasta tulee muistorikas seikkailuretki taynna kaanteita ja yllatyksia. VIIMEINEN VUORO on elokuva rakkaudesta, menetyksesta ja ihmisen luonteikkaasta periksiantamattomuudesta.

programme.title: The Dark Divide - Elamaan eksynyt
programme.desc: Tositapahtumiin perustuva Sukuvika -sarjasta tutun David Crossin ja Will and Grace -sarjasta tunnetun Debra Messingin tahdittama draamakomedia. Robert on perhostutkija, jonka vaimo sairastuu syopaan. Vaimo patistaa maansa myyneen miehen perhosretkelle, jonka odottamattomat kohtaamiset ja odotetut vastoinkaymiset avaavat Robertin silmat jalleen.

programme.title: Auggie
programme.desc: Felix Greystonen elakeikaan olisi viela tovi, mutta firma painostaa Felixin aikaistetulle elakkeelle. Laksiaislahjaksi han saa alylasit, jotka herattavat kayttajan suurimmat haaveet eloon. Kun Felixin vaimon ura on nousukiidossa ja tytar itsenaistymassa, mies huomaa tuntevansa itsensa kovin yksinaiseksi. Paetakseen piinaavaa yksinaisyytta Felix ajautuu yha syvemmalle alylasiensa maailmaan, joka hiertaa entisestaan Felixin suhdetta etaantyneeseen perheeseensa.

programme.title: The Room
programme.desc: Kiireisen suurkaupunkielaman vaatimuksiin kyllastyneet Kate ja Matt muuttavat unelmataloonsa maalla. Mutta vanhassa talossa on salaisuutensa, ja pian he loytavat tarkoin katketyn huoneen. Huone, jolla on se upea ominaisuus, etta se pystyy tuomaan esiin ja materialisoimaan kaiken, minka he toivovat. Mutta mikaan onnihan ei ole taydellinen ilman kohtalokkaita seurauksia: huoneeseen ilmestynyt ei voi lahtea huoneesta kuihtumatta pois. Ja Kate ja Matt toivovat kaikkein eniten… lasta.

programme.title: 30:e november
programme.desc: Adam kavereineen kayttaa aikaansa vihaamiensa maahanmuuttajien hairikointiin. Sitten Adam tapaa perulaisen Julian ja he salamarakastuvat. He tapaavat salassa, koska Adamin kaverit tai Julian perhe eivat hyvaksyisi suhdetta. Ruotsin kansallispaivana Adam kavereineen kohtaavat Julian veli Saschan ystavineen. Kohtaaminen johtaa kahden kuolemaan.

programme.title: Chosen
programme.desc: Vuonna 1944, tuhansittain Ita-Euroopan juutalaisia kuolee joukkoteurastuksissa. Vaimonsa kuoleman jalkeen toimimaan havahtunut unkarilainen asianajaja Sonson paatyy johtamaan vastarintaliikkeen aatteellista taistelua kasvavan epatoivon vallassa toimivaa, vaarallista natsiarmeijaa vastaan. Yhdistamalla uskalluksen ja uhkarohkeuden hapeilemattomyyteen, Sonson kaantaa silkan selviytymistaistelun joksikin paljon merkittavammaksi – keinoksi kostaa omiensa kuolema pelastamalla tuhansia muita.

programme.title: Dinner Rush
programme.desc: Elokuva sijoittuu Manhattanille, Louis Cropan omistamaan ravintola Gigino Trattoriaan. Louis Cropan poika Udo toimii ravintolan paakokkina, ja on onnistunut saavuttamaan ravintolalle mainetta kokkaustaidoillaan. Louis Cropa ei kuitenkaan ole iloinen aikaisemmin perinteista kotiruokaa tarjoilleen trattoriansa muuttumisesta yhdeksi New Yorkin trendikkaimmista ravintoloista. Omistajan elamantilannetta ei helpota sekaan, etta hanen liikekumppaninsa on vasta vahan aikaan sitten murhattu, ja hanen suojatikseen ottamansa ravintolan apukokki Duncan karsii pahasta peliriippuvuudesta.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: In 1955, London nightclub manager Ruth Ellis confesses to the murder of her abusive lover, then becomes the last woman to be executed in Britain.

programme.title: Murder Maps
programme.desc: Peter Manuel was a Scottish serial killer who killed at least eight people between 1956 -1958 around the Greater Glasgow area in Scotland.

programme.title: Crime Time Solvers
programme.desc: In the tranquil environs of Saint-Thomas-de-Conac, the discovery of a charred Mercedes and a gruesome cadaver initiated a perplexing investigation.

programme.title: Crime Time Solvers
programme.desc: A 34 year old mother is found murdered at the side of the road.

programme.title: The Railway Murders
programme.desc: In 1910, the city of Newcastle was transfixed by a murder trial. A clerk had been killed on a train and his wages bag stolen with hundreds of pounds inside.

programme.title: The Railway Murders
programme.desc: Jimmy Alcott was a troubled young man. He had joined the army after leaving school, but his time in Germany ended in disgrace when he was court-martialled for the violent murder of a civilian.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: The lifeless body of Christophe Lejard is found by his son just metres from their home. The man was shot in the head as he was getting into his car to go to work. A veritable execution, which at first glance doesnt square with the profile of the quiet family man. Yet behind the appearances, the investigation gradually reveals all the hate and resentment that revolved around the victim.

programme.title: Crime Scene Solvers
programme.desc: A man walks into a gendarmerie near Saint-Malo to report that his wife has been missing since the previous day. The couple are going through a divorce, but this mother would never have left her seven children alone! An extensive search is undertaken but the woman cannot be found. What has happened to Adeline Piet? The investigation spans several years and experiences many twists.

programme.desc: Tehokkaampi Andromedan alus rajahtaa todennakoisen sabotaasin vuoksi, ja Dylanin miehiston on pakko pelastaa heidat.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Beka vaarantaa seka miehistonsa etta kokonaisen planeetan, kun entinen rakkaus ilmestyy paikalle.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Andromeda saa avunhuudon Rev Bamilta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Dylan kuulee aania, jotka kutsuvat hanta tulen ja jaan planeetalle.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto joutuu kahden Nietzschean ylpeyden valiseen taisteluun vangitessaan vihamielisen, joka vaittaa, etta hanen ylpeydellaan on liukuvirran kartta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Vaara kaanne liukuvirran poistumisen jalkeen lahettaa Andromedan Prolon-jarjestelmaan. He pelastavat Escape-podin tietyilta katastrofeilta, mutta ylpeys haluaa sen takaisin.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto etsii kadonnutta nietzschelaisten siirtokuntaa ja loytaa toisen miehiston, joka on salaa auttanut heita.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehisto asentaa uuden tekoalyn uuteen kansainyhteison taistelulaivaan, ja luonnollisesti asiat eivat suju niin kuin pitaisi.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Viesti kerailijalta lahettaa Dylanin pelastamaan panttivangin ja loytamaan Kansainyhteison laivaston jaannokset.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Citizen Eight yrittaa poistaa Dylanin Andromedan komennosta.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Miehiston on pysaytettava maailman laivanrakentaja ennen kuin han aloittaa uuden hyokkayksen.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Nietzschelaiset kidnappaavat Dylanin ja pakottavat hanet pelaamaan ajatusleikkeja vangitsijoidensa huviksi.

programme.title: Andromeda

programme.desc: Seurauksena on panttivankitilanne, kun miehisto kohtaa Tyrin.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1996 investigation into 48-year-old Martha Hansens murder is helped by a legal requirement that bars have video cameras installed on the premises.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A police officer accused of killing his estranged wife insists she committed suicide. Investigators say it was murder - that it was physically impossible for the woman to have shot herself.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Discovering that an assault suspect is left-handed is crucial to a police investigation dating back 16 years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The 1987 disappearance of Houston resident Tracy Jo Shine is recalled. The investigation went cold until 2000 when a "cold case squad" learned that the womans ex-boyfriend Michael Neal had bragged about killing her.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: An employee of a dry cleaner was raped and murdered in the store. Police turned to forensic science for the answers they needed.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappeared along a California highway in 1991. Three years later, the case was solved when a mans refrigerated truck was looked upon with suspicion.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: With no forensic evidence inside a murder scene, investigators were baffled. But they suspected that the victims dog had witnessed the crime.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: No one in a residential community saw anything the day one of their neighbors was brutally murdered. Fingerprints found at the crime scene helped investigators to apprehend the presumed killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two people witness a truck driving over an unconscious man and flee into a nearby bar, but when the police turn up, the truck, the man and the witnesses are gone.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1988, the body of a young woman was discovered in an Ohio river. Most of the evidence had been washed away, but the victims 6-year-old son unwittingly told investigators all they needed to know - without saying a word. The clue was in his genes.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: After the murder of Seattle residents, evidence from the couples dog eventually ties a murderer to the scene.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman disappeared along a California highway in 1991. Three years later, the case was solved when a mans refrigerated truck was looked upon with suspicion.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a wealthy real estate tycoon goes missing, it appears to be foul play. In his will, he leaves instructions in case he should die under violent circumstances - which were carried out after a hiker comes across his bullet-ridden skull.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The murder of a millionaire indicated robbery, but investigators wondered if there was something more.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: While investigating the murder of 9-year-old Jessica Knott, police use a garbage bag to connect a suspect.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Native American woman was brutally killed in the desert of New Mexico, and the crime scene was rich in forensic evidence: tire tracks, shoe impressions and even the murder weapons.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Discovering that an assault suspect is left-handed is crucial to a police investigation dating back 16 years.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young couple decided to celebrate their first wedding anniversary with a camping trip to Mount Hood. During the trip, the husband was shot and killed. Later, his wife told two different versions of the events which led to his death.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When hunters found a skull in a Texas canyon, police found bits of clothing, small bones and a strand of hair. A forensic artist reconstructed her face. Now all they had to do was find her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Emergency dispatch received a call from a man who said his girlfriend shot and killed herself. The autopsy revealed that the gunshot wound was not self-inflicted and the evidence on her body would give police a golden opportunity to catch her killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When Firefighters found an entire family dead inside their home it looked like a murder-suicide, but there were several inconsistent clues in the rubble.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A 29-year-old woman was killed instantly when a bomb exploded in her home. The device was so powerful that shrapnel was embedded in houses across the street. The bomber had not only knowledge and skill, but also a motive for murder.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: In 1993, the state of Florida was known for more than just Disney World. Worldwide attention focused on a rash of robberies which targeted tourists.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Two men called police to report the same murder. The investigation uncovered more unusual circumstances.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A mother of two vanishes after a shopping trip. Her body is discovered a month later. Witnesses say they saw the victim being forced into a car by an unknown person.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Investigators sift through the ashes of a fire which killed a 40-year-old woman. The fire appears to have been started by an unattended cigarette. On closer look, forensic scientists discover the cause was far more complicated.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When the mail-order bride of a former army sergeant goes missing, investigators look into the deaths of the mans previous two wives.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a young boy went missing, police organized the largest search in the history of their small town.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a pipe bomb rips through a rural home, killing a young man and seriously injuring his mother, detectives hope that the remnants of a mailing label will lead them to a killer.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: Three seemingly unrelated deaths proved to be serial murders. The killer used poison which had no taste.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A Colorado hunter is the victim of a well-planned crime. Investigators suspect two weapons and two killers.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: The police investigate when a severed leg is discovered among garbage. Conventional means of identifying the victim are impossible, leading investigators to rely on DNA, forensic anthropology and toxicology.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A woman convicted of killing her mother in a car fire is granted a new trial. An expert witness has a different opinion as to how the fire started and, if proven, would clear the woman of any culpability.

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: When a serial killer was terrorizing the city of St. Louis, the FBI didnt need lab tests, fingerprints or any of the usual methods. All they needed was a computer.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files
programme.desc: A young woman suddenly becomes critically ill, eventually leaving her unable to walk. A bone marrow test reveals the cause: arsenic poisoning. Investigators must determine if the poisoning was caused by groundwater contamination or something more sinister.

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.title: Forensic Files

programme.desc: After the murder of Seattle residents, evidence from the couples dog eventually ties a murderer to the scene.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 103: Last Heavyweight Standing main event features Levi Rigters (19-3, 9 KO) colliding with Jamal Ben Saddik (38-10, 29 KO) to see who moves on in the tournament. Among the other names taking part in Phase Two are Nabil Khachab (29-6-1, 4 KO), Iancu Ionut (31-11, 13 KO), Rade Opacic (21-7, 16 KO), Milos Cvjeticanin (13-4, 9 KO), Sofian Laidouni (39-5-1, 20 KO), and many more. In addition, Chico Kwasi (44-5-2, 23 KO) will defend his GLORY welterweight world title against Mehdi Ait El Hadj (35-4-2, 8 KO), Mory Kromah (34-3-1, 20 KO) returns and takes on Cristian Ristea (44-26, 13 KO) in a heavyweight match-up outside the tournament, and Tayfun Ozcan (88-11-3, 28 KO) clashes with rival...

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Former Light Heavyweight Champion Tarik Khbabez (52-12-1, 22 KO) and Bahram Rajabzabeh (72-5, 63 KO) collide in a huge showdown for the vacant Light Heavyweight title. The penultimate round of the Last Heavyweight Standing tournament resumes with eight heavyweights competing in two separate four-man one-night tournaments. Notable participants include Levi Rigters (20-3, 10 KO), Nabil Khachab (30-6-1, 4 KO), Rade Opacic (22-7, 17 KO) and Milos Cvjeticanin (14-4, 9 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Headlined by a high-stakes trilogy clash between Antonio Plazibat and longtime rival Nordine Mahieddine. Knockout artist Errol Zimmerman takes on former Australian strongman Alex Simon. Also, two explosive four-man, one-night tournaments in the welterweight and light heavyweight divisions—guaranteeing nonstop drama, finishes, and rising contenders.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The winners have been announced and this final programme follows the successful chefs in the run up to the banquet, as they make the painstaking preparations, for what is one of the most important meals they will ever cook.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The spotlight is on Scotland. Returning contenders Michael Smith, Tony Singh and Mark Greenaway are all determined to get one of their dishes to the banquet at the Royal Albert Hall to celebrate 25 years of Comic Reliefs Red Nose Day.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The competition continues as returning contenders Michael Smith, Tony Singh and Mark Greenaway cook their fish dishes. Will a traditional Scottish soup, or a chowder or a risky no cook mackerel dish impress veteran judge Angela Hartnett MBE?

programme.title: Great British Menu
