programme.desc: Its decision time on Great British Menu Does Comic Relief for the chefs from Scotland. One chef left the competition and only two remain, who will cook their entire menus for the Great British Menu judges, Prue Leith, Matthew Fort and Oliver Peyton.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: It is the turn of three chefs from the North West. Returning contender Aiden Byrne is determined to go all the way. Hes up against two fiercely competitive newcomers Mary-Ellen McTague and Chris Holland both of whom are determined to make their mark.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs from the North West cook their fish courses. Will Aiden Byrnes The Culinary Joke - a take on a classic prawn cocktail raise a laugh? Or will Mary-Ellen McTagues dish of Dover sole or Chris Hollands Gone Fishing salmon dish prove winners?

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.desc: The chefs cook their main course. Will Aiden Byrnes witty beef dish entitled Long Horn Beef With Noodle Pot prove a winner? Or will Mary-Ellen McTagues goat dish called Our Kid or Chris Hollands dish called A Tasting of Pork score highly?

programme.desc: The chefs cook their fish courses. Daniel Clifford puts up a creative dish called Catch of the Day. Richard Bainbridges dish is titled Tongue in Cheek. And Will Hollands dish - Coconut poached brill, crab, celeriac and tomato essence.

programme.title: Great British Menu

programme.desc: The curtain raises on London and the South East - newcomers Matt Gillan and Adam Simmonds come face-to-face with returning contender Tom Aikens. Today its the starter course and someone makes a schoolboy error.

programme.title: Great British Menu
programme.sub-title: S08 : E37 London and South East Fish
programme.desc: Today its the fish course and Tom and Matt battle it out with scallop dishes while Adam delivers Langoustine and Oysters. But who will come out on top?

programme.title: I Am Sartana, Your Angel of Death
programme.desc: A bank that was thought to be impenetrable is robbed by a man wearing the trademark Sartana cloak. Our black-clad hero soon has a price on his head and must try to proof his innocence with the help of his shabby friend Buddy Ben.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP29-32
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: And the Crows Will Dig Your Grave
programme.desc: After the Civil War, Wells Fargo hires pistoleros to protect against increasing banditry. Jeff Sullivan, driven by revenge for the brutal murder of his wife by Glenn Kovacks and his gang, joins the effort. Sullivan partners with Pancho Corrales and pursues Kovacks, using Kovacks stepbrother, Dan, as leverage. Their final confrontation leads to a deadly showdown.

programme.title: Deadly Trackers
programme.desc: Jeff sets out to murder each one of the five outlaws who robbed, raped and killed his poor sister.

programme.title: Buckskin Frontier
programme.desc: A railroad man and the owner of a freight line battle for control of a crucial mountain pass.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 28, 29, 30
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: My Name is Pecos
programme.desc: Everyone wants to know who the Mexican is. He always answer slowly, "my name is Pecos". Pecos Martinez to be exact, and hes returned to his hometown of Houston to settle up with Clain, the leader of a gang of cut-throats. Clain is busy looking for the money from a recent robbery thats been stolen from him. Soon the stolen cash in Pecos vengeance entwine and all hell breaks loose. Behind the scenes a Bible touting Undertaker (Umberto Raho), a cowardly saloon owner, and a helpful saloon girl become part of the story. This film made Woods as internationally known as Pecos in the third world countries as Franco Nero was known for Django. A Mexican hero against a gang and a town full of...

programme.title: White Fang and the Gold Diggers
programme.desc: Sandy Shaw inherits the "Eagles Nest" gold mine in Canadas wild north. With his son Rick and dog Whiskey, he faces Taft, a ruthless rival eager to claim the mine. When Sandy’s proxy bride arrives, the clash of greed, revenge, and betrayal turns deadly in this fight for survival.

programme.title: Beauty and the Bandit
programme.desc: In Old California, a Frenchman carrying silver is ambushed by Cisco, a bandit claiming the money belongs to the poor. When the "Frenchman" is revealed to be Jeanne DuBois, she follows Cisco to his lair. As romance blooms, Cisco offers to return the silver to her. Jeanne must now choose between her deal and aiding Ciscos quest to help the needy.

programme.title: The Return of Jack Slade
programme.desc: Jack Slade, son of a legendary lawman, infiltrates a ruthless gang of outlaws to bring them down from within. After his friend is killed, Slade sets a deadly trap with the help of a Pinkerton agent. Deception, betrayal, and revenge ride hard in this classic Western showdown.

programme.title: Two Crosses at Danger Pass
programme.desc: Judy and Alex are the only two survivors of a punitive mission ordered by the rich and ruthless Moran.... The girl becomes his maid and the boy is adopted by a Quaker family. Alex, despite the philosophy of forgiveness he has been taught, plans to take revenge.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 46, 47
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Dead Aim
programme.desc: A traveling gravedigger during an war adopts a orphan he finds alone in the desert. After the war with the orphan grown and business slow, the orphan begins to generate business himself by shooting people.

programme.title: Trinity and Sartana Are Coming
programme.desc: Sartana and Trinity set out on a grudging relationship hell bent for gold and comic brawls.

programme.title: The Girl from San Lorenzo
programme.desc: Two outlaws posing as Cisco and Pancho are wreaking havoc. When the real Cisco and Pancho are captured, the criminals plan a final heist, using the duo as alibis. After breaking them out of jail, the real heroes have a chance to escape and clear their names by capturing the imposters. Will they succeed or be caught again?

programme.title: Lightning Jack
programme.desc: Lightning Jack Kane is an Australian outlaw in the wild west. During a bungled bank robbery he picks up mute Ben Doyle as a hostage. The two become good friends, with Jack teaching Ben how to rob banks, while they plan Jacks last heist.

programme.title: War Paint
programme.desc: Lieut. Billings and his patrol must deliver a peace treaty to Chief Gray Cloud in nine days to prevent war. Guided by the chief’s son, Taslik, they face dwindling water and rising tensions. As suspicions grow, they notice Taslik wearing war paint. Is he leading them to peace or into a trap?

programme.title: Stagecoach
programme.desc: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

programme.title: The Over-the-Hill Gang Rides Again
programme.desc: Retired Texas Ranger Nash Crawford re-assembles his former Ranger outfit from the old days to fight crime in his hometown.

programme.title: Murieta!
programme.desc: The story of Joaquin Murrieta, a real life Mexican bandit who terrorized California with his gang of raiders and cutthroats during the first half of the 19th century. Some saw him as a murderous outlaw, others as the Mexican Robin Hood.

programme.title: Rimfire
programme.desc: Captain Tom Harvey, an undercover army agent, investigates stolen army gold shipments. Posing as a deputy sheriff, he is drawn into solving the mystery of a ghost haunting the town. The ghost is believed to be the spirit of a gambler wrongly hanged for the thefts. Harveys investigation leads him to uncover a dark truth behind the ghostly terror.

programme.title: Bandidos
programme.desc: Renowned gunman Richard Martin is traveling on a train, held up by Billy Kane, a former student of Martins. Kane spares Martin, but only after shooting his hands. Years later, Martin meets an escaped convict, wrongly convicted for the train robbery. Martin trains his new student and both men seek out Billy Kane.

programme.title: The Tall Texan
programme.desc: Five travelers - a tinhorn and his lover, a sheriff with a prisoner, and a sea captain with a murky past—cross Comanche country. When a renegade Indian reveals a hidden gold field to repay their kindness, greed takes over, sparking tension and dangerous decisions as the group’s true motives are laid bare.

programme.title: The Cisco Kid Returns
programme.desc: Cisco Kid stops Rosita’s marriage to Harris, claiming she’s his wife and presenting a borrowed child, Nancy, as proof. After Nancy’s father is killed, Cisco protects her from schemers Harris and Conway, who want her inheritance. With clever plotting, Cisco and Pancho outwit the villains to ensure Nancy’s safety.

programme.title: Man Who Cried for Revenge
programme.desc: Davy Flanagan, a former Union officer who was part of an attempt to break out of a Confederate prison camp during the Civil War and suffered a blow to the head that left him with amnesia. Then a bounty hunter shows up to collect a bounty on his head as a deserter.

programme.title: Mackenzies Raiders EP21-24
programme.desc: Colonel Mackenzie, commander of the 4th Cavalry Regiment at Fort Clark near Brackettville in Kinney County in southwest Texas during the 1870s, receives secret orders from President Ulysses S. Grant and Secretary of War William W. Belknap to stop bandits from crossing the Rio Grande into the United States, or from returning to Mexico.

programme.title: The Cariboo Trail
programme.desc: Montanans Jim Redfern and Mike Evans head into Canadas British Columbia via the Cariboo Trail intent to raise cattle and dig for gold but find trouble instead.

programme.title: Death on High Mountain
programme.desc: A major robbery spirals out of control when two young men cross paths with ruthless Mexican bandits and a corrupt businessman—both desperate to reclaim the stolen loot. Caught in a deadly chase, the youths face danger, betrayal, and the fight for survival.

programme.title: And Now... Make Your Peace with God
programme.desc: Two men ride toward Denver City, each chasing a ghost from the past—one seeks his father’s killer, the other a treacherous friend who stole his gold. Along the way, a silent, deadly gunslinger joins them, his motives unknown. In the shadows of vengeance, alliances shift and secrets unravel.

programme.title: Madron
programme.desc: A nun, the only survivor of an Indian massacre of a wagon train, is taken in by a cantankerous old gunfighter.

programme.title: $100,000 for Ringo
programme.desc: Stranger Lee Barton rides into Rainbow Valley, mistaken for a man thought dead. As tensions rise with ruthless town boss Tom Cherry—whos after hidden gold and the affections of a local woman—Barton is drawn into violence and revenge. With a sheriffs help, he seeks justice and a new start with a boy who believes hes his father.

programme.title: Bonanza Compilation Episodes 31, 32, 33
programme.desc: The Wild West adventures of Ben Cartwright and his sons as they run and defend their Nevada ranch while helping the surrounding community.

programme.title: Spencers Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Join charismatic chef Spencer Watts at his glorious rooftop patio for a one-hour special featuring a full holiday spread, all made on the BBQ. Spencer’s festive menu is all about creative BBQ twists with his delectable, mouth-watering recipes including Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie, and Asparagus with Smoked Salmon Dip. Save room for the piece de Q-sistance: Smoked Turkey Two Ways. This year, take your holiday feast outside and serve up something deliciously different.

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Twists on the Classics
programme.desc: Christmas is right around the corner and it calls for a little fun - like a twist on traditional holiday desserts! FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: TWISTS ON THE CLASSICS offers a new take on some of your favourites to bring you a fresh perspective and world of flavour for the holidays! Enchanting host Jessica McGovern plays off classic desserts, serving up handy hints on how to get the most out of every bite. From sweet and fluffy Gumdrop Cakes drizzled with a light lemony glaze to a delectable Eggnog Ski Slope Cake decorated with rosemary trees and a few friends to hit the hills, Jessicas unique holiday recipes will surly make it on your list of Christmas traditions!

programme.title: One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.desc: Celebrate the holidays with One World Kitchens baked treats from Italy, Japan, Thailand, and Argentina. Our hosts Vanessa, Hana, Pailin, and Natalia put a global twist on classic recipes with Panforte, honey-drizzled Struffoli, Matcha Cheesecake, Thai Shortbread Cookies, Turron, and Pan Dulce. Our warm hosts serve up sweet treats inspired by traditions and family secrets. One World Kitchen: Bakes the Holidays will put you in the festive spirit and bring new holiday traditions to your home!

programme.title: Michael Bonacinis Christmas at the Farm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Michael Bonacinis Christmas at the Farm
programme.desc: In this heartwarming holiday special, Chef Michael Bonacini invites us to his cozy farmhouse in Ontario for a charming Christmas feast. In this scenic winter retreat, Bonacini interprets classic Welsh and Italian Christmas dishes from his childhood. Michael cooks up comforting dishes from hearty potato leek soup, to succulent roast lamb, to classic molten chocolate lava cake. As he explores homey Christmas flavours, Michael shares his traditions and gives tips for perfecting the holiday meal.

programme.title: Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.desc: Spencer Watts serves up his take on traditional holiday fare, showing us that you can make an impressive dinner without the stress. In this cheerful one-hour special, charming bachelor Spencer takes you through all the planning tips and lets you in on his secrets to create the ultimate holiday meal.

programme.title: BLITZN
programme.desc: Get ready for a special holiday BLITZ! with master mixologist Yvonne Langen as she prepares her favorite holiday cocktails and party snacks in the Gusto TV kitchen!

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini uses the fresh ingredients from rich Tuscan soil to make regional dishes like Spinach Ricotta Gnudi.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini explores classic dishes from the central Italian region, Le Marche.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Its All About the Olive Oil
programme.desc: The greatest staple of Italian cuisine? Olive oil! Host Vanessa Gianfrancesco uses olive oil to make delightful Italian dishes.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen features dishes like Japanese Chicken Wings and Chawanmushi for a lovely feast.

programme.title: Holiday Eatz
programme.desc: Boxing Day is more than just the day-after-the-other-holiday"”evolving from the centuries old practice of packing boxed gifts for the staff, now its a great excuse for Holiday Eatz Kimberly Lallouz to cook up some edible gifts of her own! Our host kicks off her Boxing Day menu with a Spinach and Feta Egg White Omelette. Next, she makes a Muffuletta Sandwich with an Olive Tapenade. Then, using leftover turkey, she makes a Turkey Mulligatawny. For her final flourish, a Spiced Cranberry Chutney.

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Layers of Thai Flavour
programme.desc: Thai host Palin Congchitnant uses fresh Thai ingredients and flavours to make Smoked Trout Salad and a Kaffir Lime Vodka Martini.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.desc: Chef and seafood lover Spencer Watts mixes the sweet flavours of fruit with fish as he makes dishes with salmon and scallops.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.desc: Seafood and dairy make the perfect partners. Watch as Chef Spencer Watts creates some dairy-infused dishes using red snapper and scampi.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.desc: Chef and seafood lover Spencer Watts makes tastebuds dance as he creates recipes that combine sour and tart flavours with grouper and clams.

programme.title: Fish the Dish
programme.desc: Caffeine isnt just to get you going in the morning. Chef Spencer Watts shows how tea and coffee can add a lot of flavour to tuna and mussels.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: For this "N" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas works with noodles and nectarines. For her first dish, Lauren cooks up a breaded nectarine and mozzarella stack. Talking technique, she shows us how to cut nectarines into rounds. She does the same with some soft mozzarella and then walks us through the art of a balsamic reduction. For the noodles, Chef Lauren puts an elegant twist on your childhood favourite with a lobster mac and cheese. She spares no flavours, adding fried bacon, garlic, cayenne pepper, mustard powder, and even dry vermouth. This is no ordinary noodle dish. But now for the real challenge! Chef Lauren works with the noodles and nectarines.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this episode, Chef Robert Jewell explores recipes using two very different ingredients that start with the letter "O," oats and okra. For his first dish, Robert uses okra in a classic cornmeal cake recipe, but bumps up the flavour factor with spicy jalapenos. Robert balances the heat of the jalapeno with a tart green tomato and crunchy red onion salsa. In his next recipe, Robert keeps the heat, but switches up his recipes for a curry-spiced oat pancake. This Indian inspired dish needs something to cool it down and Robert knows exactly what that is - sweet, silky applesauce! Hes up for the challenge when it comes to combining okra and oats into one dish, and the results are tasty!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E11 Lamb Episode with Chef Craig Wong
programme.desc: Chef Craig Wong loves cooking lamb, and with his expert advice, you will too!

programme.title: Cook Like a Chef
programme.sub-title: S06 : E12 Game Episode with Chef Derek Dammann
programme.desc: Game meats are on the menu for Chef Derek Dammann in this protein-packed episode of Cook Like a Chef.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Heres a tongue twister: Theresa, tuna, tangerine! In this episode, host Theresa Visintin picks her favourite letter, "T," and introduces us to scrumptious recipes using tuna and tangerine. Theresa loves tuna and Italian cuisine, so naturally she combines both to create a mouth-watering pasta with some savoury tomato, olive, and tuna sauce. Next, Theresa satisfies her sweet tooth with a decadent tangerine parfait! Using the sweet juice of the tangerine, Theresa creates gelatin, with a hint of orange liqueur. She tops it all off by whipping up a fluffy cream to complete this sweet treat. Then its time for a real challenge: tuna and tangerine in one recipe!

programme.title: Gustos QR Countdown
programme.desc: Unlock Gusto TVs top recipes on QR Countdown! Thousands of viewers scan our QR codes to access our delicious dishes. Now, were serving up 8 of our most recipes with beans, from hosts like Pino De Cirbo and Vanessa Gianfrancesco.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Cheese or chocolate? Why not both! In this "C" challenge, host Theresa Visintin takes on both decadent ingredients. But first, she shows us that being cheesy is easy, especially when you stuff chicken breast with creamy goats cheese and finely diced apples. Theresa takes the flavour one step further by coating the stuffed chicken with sage, parmesan, and panko bread crumbs, then frying it to a crispy golden brown. Next, Theresa whips up a dessert fan favourite, the decadent and oh-so-irresistible dark chocolate lava cake. Finally, Theresa has an irresistible recipe using ooey gooey cheese and warm chocolate.

programme.title: Maddie and Kikis Holiday BBQ Barn
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Maddie and Kikis Holiday BBQ Barn
programme.desc: Fun-loving sisters and expert grillmasters Maddie and Kiki welcome you into their country barn to celebrate the holidays! They’re making a full menu of festive dishes on the BBQ – plus some drinks to get you in the party mood!

programme.title: Holiday Eatz
programme.desc: Boxing Day is more than just the day-after-the-other-holiday"”evolving from the centuries old practice of packing boxed gifts for the staff, now its a great excuse for Holiday Eatz Kimberly Lallouz to cook up some edible gifts of her own! Our host kicks off her Boxing Day menu with a Spinach and Feta Egg White Omelette. Next, she makes a Muffuletta Sandwich with an Olive Tapenade. Then, using leftover turkey, she makes a Turkey Mulligatawny. For her final flourish, a Spiced Cranberry Chutney.

programme.title: Global Street Eats
programme.desc: Chef Dev loves spicy food. so he’s making some of his favorite street food recipes that use chilis. including Hawawshi sandwiches from Egypt. Chicken 65 from India. and Street Corn from Mexico.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Desiree Nielsen shows how beets can make the icing on a delectable cupcake vibrant and delicious.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Foodie Desiree Nielsen gives life to spotty bananas, transforming it into melt-in-your-mouth bread.

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Veggies All Day Long
programme.desc: Its beets for breakfast with host Desiree Nielsen. This surprising early morning addition gives you a reason to get out of bed!

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Fa-what? Fa-waffles! Desiree Nielsen cooks up protein-rich falafel waffles for breakfast.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini delves into the Italian region of Emilia- Romagna to discover its iconic cuisine. To start, Michael stays light with an airy Mortadella Mousse spread on fluffy Modena Mini Flatbreads. Next, Michael cooks up Tortellini in Broth, a dish originally from Bologna that can be easily altered to personal taste. Michael chooses to fill his tortellini with a rich and savoury mixture of prosciutto, mortadella, and ground pork. For his secondo, Michael uses traditional ingredients and pairs them in a tart, luxurious dish of Duck Breast with Balsamic Cherry Sauce. To wind down his meal, Michael whips up a creamy classic, Rice Custard Cake topped with a Cherry Glaze.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini explores sweet and spicy dishes hailing from the coastal region of Calabria. For his antipasto, Michael cooks up a light and refreshing Brioche with Gelato. Fluffy brioche buns surround the sweet flavours of gelato for a delicious start to your meal. Switching to spice for the primo, Michael introduces a Spicy Sausage and Ricotta Pasta. Full of sweet, savoury, and spicy flavours, this dish provides a strong, flavourful meal sure to please any crowd. For his secondo, Michael goes for a hearty Lamb au Gratin with Peas and Asparagus; a classic holiday dish that will warm any room. For his finale, Michael whips up a simple, yet impressive, Chocolate-covered Figs.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Full of luxurious treats, the northern Italian region of Lombardy offers rich and delicious cuisine. For his antipasto, celebrity chef Michael Bonacini prepares a delicate dish of Stuffed Squash Blossoms. Soft and light, these blossoms are enhanced with a creamy filling of parmesan, anchovies, and nutmeg. Following the fresh taste of flowers, Michael cooks up an impressive and rich Risotto Milanese. A feast for your eyes and taste buds, this risotto is coloured by saffron and its floral strands release flavour and colour as its cooked. For his secondo Michael pairs a succulent Veal Roast with the sweet and sour Mustard Fruit to bring out a tangy delight. Michaels dolce looks solely at...

programme.title: Bonacinis Italy
programme.desc: Known for its lush landscape, Umbria is a region of that offers fresh, seasonal ingredients perfect for simple yet boldly flavoured cuisine. To begin his Umbrian feast, Chef Michael Bonacini serves up a sweet and spicy antipasto of Fried Spicy Tomato Flatbread. Seasoned with chili peppers for that bit of heat, Michaels antipasto is a humble yet satisfying snack. For his primo, Michael brings our attention to an Umbrian specialty: truffles! Prepared with light and fluffy pasta, Michaels Gnocchi with Black Truffle concentrates the decadent flavour of the truffle in the pillowy pasta to create a rich and delectable dish. Paying homage to the plights of farmers and fisherman, Michaels...

programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Bursts of Japanese Flavours
programme.desc: Host Hana Etsuke Dethlefsen makes casual Japanese cuisine like Savoury Japanese Pancakes and Gyoza three-ways.

programme.desc: Cheerful host Vijaya Selvaraju shows us how to DIY some of the important staples of Indian cuisine.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: In this "H" challenge, Chef Lauren Gulyas decides to take on the unique flavours of halibut and horseradish. She starts with a perfectly prepared prosciutto wrapped halibut, pairing the buttery flavour of the fish with the saltiness of the cured meat. Throw in some dill potatoes and youve got a beautifully balanced dish. Next up, Chef Lauren show us how to make a delightful roast beef dip with a zesty horseradish sauce using carrots, vinegar, mayo and a little lemon. Finally, she is challenged to make a dish that combines both ingredients, and does she ever deliver!

programme.desc: Vanessa takes on take-out with a menu of homemade favorites and a table to match! Theres pepperoni naan pizzas, salmon burgers, chicken fingers, a crudite platter, dips, and so much more!

programme.desc: Vanessa and Stefania take a delicious trip down memory lane with a menu of meaningful dishes and a table to match! There’s Tuscan beans, gnocchi with a duo of sauces, short rib braciole, chocolate semifreddo, and so much more!

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Our Favourite Holiday Recipes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One World Kitchen: Our Favourite Holiday Recipes
programme.desc: In this special holiday episode of One World Kitchen, Hana (Japan), Vanessa (Italy), Natalia (Argentina), and Pailin (Thailand) get together to cook their favorite traditional holiday dishes influenced by their respective cultures. Christmas Sushi Rolls, Veal in a Creamy Tuna Sauce with Capers, Striped Bass in Garlic and Lime Marinade, and an epic Timballo. For the final recipe, our hosts combine all the flavors of One World Kitchen into a truly internationally-inspired turkey dish.

programme.title: Bonacinis Italian Christmas
programme.desc: BONACINIS ITALIAN CHRISTMAS is a heartwarming one-hour holiday special featuring celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini as he shares some of his favourite Italian Christmas Eve dishes. Michael invites us to the set of his series "Bonacinis Italy" to cook up traditional Italian fare like Salt Cod Mousse on Polenta Crostini and Pork Braised in Milk. Michael takes us on a holiday culinary journey as he explores homey Christmas flavours and traditions, offering tips for perfecting dishes from the regions of Veneto, Sardinia, Calabria, Sicily, and Emilia Romagna.

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.desc: The holidays are here! And the holidays come with a lineup of treats you wont be able to resist! From sweet and salty to traditional and unconventional, FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: BIG WOW DESSERTS covers it all. To get in the holiday spirit, enchanting host Jessica McGovern introduces two desserts that could impress any Scrooge. First, Jessica bakes a decadent Chocolate Yule Log stuffed with a creamy Salted Caramel Frosting and finishes with a holiday-inspired cake decorated with homemade peppermint candy canes! Interwoven with tricks of the trade, Jessica guides us through her simple yet inspiring treats that are perfect for a big Christmas celebration.

programme.title: Spencers Big Holiday
programme.desc: No matter how you celebrate the holidays, let Spencer Watts help you plan the menu, in SPENCER’S BIG HOLIDAY! In this festive one-hour holiday special, Spencer Watts is serving up some of his favourite holiday meals, treats, and drinks. Follow Spencer as he shows us how to sail through the hectic holiday season with style, from brunch to the moment the clock strikes midnight.

programme.title: One BIG Holiday Recipe
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 One BIG Holiday Recipe
programme.desc: One BIG Recipe is all about cooking for family and friends and so are the holidays! Check out cool chef Kimberly Lallouzs take on holiday favourites in this special seasonal episode. Her first course is a Moroccan spiced Beet Latke with lightly dressed greens and creme fraiche. Next, whole fennel is braised tender, gratineed and spiked with apple chutney. Entrees include a one-of-a-king Turkey Breast Buche de Noel roulade and a juicy, beefy espresso-red wine spiked Brisket roast. Along with her main course come her unique, single-serving Stuffin muffins, two sauces, sugar snap peas and watermelon radishes. And dont leave without her sweet hostess gifts, White Chocolate Brittle-Bark...

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.desc: Christmas is near, and the pressure is on! Between work, home, friends, and family, the list of people to buy for is endless. To help us through this busy time, FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: EDIBLE GIFTS offers up four creative and more personal options to make the holidays cheaper, sweeter, and filled with love. Fun host Jessica McGovern shows us how to bake something for everyone including Crispy Brittle Bark covered in chocolate, rich Coal Cookies that are sweet with a bit of heat, adorable peanut butter-chocolate Reindeer Cupcakes, and easy-to-make Christmas Puzzle Cookies.

programme.title: Christmas With Bonacini
programme.desc: Christmas with Bonacini is a charming one-hour holiday special featuring celebrity chef Michael Bonacini and his son Oscar. Michael inspires with his favourite Christmas recipes that will add a twinkle of sophistication to your dinner table while lifting holiday spirits.

programme.title: Spencers Holiday BBQ
programme.desc: Join charismatic chef Spencer Watts at his glorious rooftop patio for a one-hour special featuring a full holiday spread, all made on the BBQ. Spencer’s festive menu is all about creative BBQ twists with his delectable, mouth-watering recipes including Burnt Orange Cranberry Marmalade, Maple Rye Pumpkin Pie, and Asparagus with Smoked Salmon Dip. Save room for the piece de Q-sistance: Smoked Turkey Two Ways. This year, take your holiday feast outside and serve up something deliciously different.

programme.title: Flour Power Holiday Specials
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Twists on the Classics
programme.desc: Christmas is right around the corner and it calls for a little fun - like a twist on traditional holiday desserts! FLOUR POWER CHRISTMAS: TWISTS ON THE CLASSICS offers a new take on some of your favourites to bring you a fresh perspective and world of flavour for the holidays! Enchanting host Jessica McGovern plays off classic desserts, serving up handy hints on how to get the most out of every bite. From sweet and fluffy Gumdrop Cakes drizzled with a light lemony glaze to a delectable Eggnog Ski Slope Cake decorated with rosemary trees and a few friends to hit the hills, Jessicas unique holiday recipes will surly make it on your list of Christmas traditions!

programme.title: The Wizard of Whatever: Holiday Edition
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Wizard of Whatever: Holiday Edition
programme.desc: Gusto TV’s Wizard of Whatever, Chef Kyle Crawford, is dishing up a holiday feast! There’ll be food, fun, elves… and even jolly old St. Nick himself may make an appearance! Join in as Kyle cooks up a Christmas goose complete with stuffing and gravy, plus all the sides and salads, and even a flashy flambe dessert! Merry whatever!

programme.title: Michael Bonacinis Christmas at the Farm
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Michael Bonacinis Christmas at the Farm
programme.desc: In this heartwarming holiday special, Chef Michael Bonacini invites us to his cozy farmhouse in Ontario for a charming Christmas feast. In this scenic winter retreat, Bonacini interprets classic Welsh and Italian Christmas dishes from his childhood. Michael cooks up comforting dishes from hearty potato leek soup, to succulent roast lamb, to classic molten chocolate lava cake. As he explores homey Christmas flavours, Michael shares his traditions and gives tips for perfecting the holiday meal.

programme.title: Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Watts Up for the Holidays
programme.desc: Spencer Watts serves up his take on traditional holiday fare, showing us that you can make an impressive dinner without the stress. In this cheerful one-hour special, charming bachelor Spencer takes you through all the planning tips and lets you in on his secrets to create the ultimate holiday meal.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: In a showdown between the winners from Series 1 and the powerhouse Russian Red Devils, Mario Rinaldi is in tough against Sergey Kaznovski. The Russian is reknowned for short, brutal fights, earning him a reputation as the king of the 1st round KO. This is not the first time Trevor Pragley and Andrei Semenov have met in the ring. Last time, Semenov was battered into submission, so he come into this fight hungry for revenge.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Ultimate Warrior Challenge is one of Europes leading MMA shows, since its inception in 2006 its has grown steadily and delivered some of the most exciting MMA fights Europe has seen, with a truly Internationalfight roster, UWC has built a solid reputation for bringing some of the Worlds toughest fighters to square off in the UWC octagon, fighters from the UK, USA, Brazil, Sweden, Italy, Africa, Poland, France, Cyprus, Greece have all fought in the UWC cage.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Bill Mahood has studied every martial art imaginable, and hell need all that experience when he takes on Kalil Ibrahim, a karate ans kickboxing expert. Steve Steinbeiss fights Jeff Ford, an MMA champion and a personal trainer on VH1s Celebrity Fight Club.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Training for over 40 years, Vince Gentiles entire life is coaching. Owning his own gym, Vince is passionate about investing time in the next generation of fighters.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athletes success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Gary Vig as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Peter Arbeau brings strong Muay Thai influences to his MMA matches. This is an intense bout against an equally skilled Matt Krayco, with fists and legs flying.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but hes riding his own winning streak. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now hes fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyans first chance at North American exposure. Wisniewskis development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.desc: The L.A.-bred emcee discusses his love of golf and his favorite shabby-shabu restaurant. As the Scovilles crank, the hat comes off, the sweats starts pouring and Schoolboy earns respect for YG and Sean Evans.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Fluffy battles the wings of death and discusses his outlandish food adventures, iconic wrestling catchphrases and the keys to getting out of a speeding ticket. Dont be surprised when the scorching sauces bring some other characters out to play.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern may have traveled the globe eating chilies in Thailand, but hes never faced Da Bomb and the Last Dab: Apollo. Watch him share wisdom on everything from the cultural significance of supermarkets to birria tacos.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: The pop star of the moment, Olivia Rodrigo, takes on the wings of death and discusses everything from lyricism to ghost stories to the appeal of Trader Joes.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: In between painful fits of laughter, Danny Brown manages to share some top-shelf anecdotes about the Gathering of the Juggalos, 50 Cents fashion tips and his beloved cats.

programme.title: Hot Ones
programme.desc: One of the nicest dudes in Hollywood takes on some of the least nice hot sauces on the planet. Paul Rudd breaks down the alternate "Anchorman" script, shares his love for David Letterman and improvises a tearful scene inspired by the wings of death.

programme.title: Arlington Road
programme.desc: Michael Faraday on katkera FBI:n agenttina toimineen vaimonsa kuolemasta. Han asuu poikansa Grantin kanssa rauhallisella esikaaupunkialueella, jossa he tutustuvat miellyttaviin naapureihinsa Oliver ja Cheryl Langiin. Ystavyyden syventyessa Michael alkaa epailemaan naapureidensa todellista taustaa ja uskoo loytaneensa yhteyksia terrorismiin.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Mies heraa sairaalassa, eika hanella ole muistikuvaa siita, kuka han on tai miten han paatyi sinne. Hanta hoitava Diana (Eastwood) ei loyda mitaan henkilopapereita, joten han kutsuu miesta John Doeksi (Rhys Meyers). Poliisi syyttaa Johnia sarjamurhaajaksi, joka on tappanut useita nuoria naisia alueella. Kun Johnia aiotaan kuulustella, han onnistuu pakenemaan Dianan avulla, joka on varma hanen syyttomyydestaan. He ajavat viimeisimmalle rikospaikalle etsimaan johtolankoja ja vastauksia todistaakseen Johnin syyttomyyden. Hyva sairaanhoitaja kuulee raastavan totuuden Johnin henkilollisyydesta seka valheiden ja petosten verkosta, joka vie Johnin viela viimeiseen ratkaisevaan taisteluun.

programme.title: What We Did On Our Holiday
programme.desc: Doug (David Tennant) ja Abi (Rosamund Pike) ovat aivan normaalit vanhemmat, joilla on kolme hurmaavaa, mutta omalaatuista lasta. Kun vanhemmuuden raskaus uhkaa niin avioliittoa kuin mielenterveyttakin, he paattavat vieda lapset Skotlantiin. Dougin eksentrinen isa Gordie (Billy Connolly) nimittain tayttaa 75. Sovinnon ja anteeksiannon viikonloppu muuttuu pian ratkiriemukkaaksi sosiaaliseksi miinakentaksi, kun vanhat kaunat, vaarinymmarrykset ja runnellut egot vaativat saada puheenvuoron.

programme.title: Arvottomat
programme.desc: Mika Kaurismaen ensimmainen pitka elokuva. Kasikirjoituksen han teki yhdessa veljensa Akin kanssa. Arvottomat on ajaton kuvaus siita kuinka Pikkurikollinen Manne, maalaispoika Harri ja kaunis Veera ajavat Volgalla lapi katoavien suomalaismaisemien, poliisien ja gangsterien roikkuessa herkeamatta kintereilla.. Vauhdikasta matkaa siivittavat mm. Juicen ja Rauli Baddingin ikivihreat kappaleet.

programme.title: My Old Lady
programme.desc: New Yorkissa asuva tyhjatasku Mathias perii pariisilaisasunnon isaltaan, jota han ei koskaan tuntenut. Uudessa kiinteistossa Mathiasta odottaa kuitenkin yllatys vanhahkon, sivistyneen rouva Mathilden ja hanen suojelevaisen tyttarensa asuttaessa asuntoa. Ikivanhan ranskalaisen lakipykalan vuoksi omaisuutta ei voi siirtaa perijalle ennen asukkaan, eli Mathilden kuolemaa. Mathias paattaa yrittaa asunnon myymista kaikesta huolimatta, mutta vahitellen selviaa, etta hanen isallaan ja Mathildella on ollut pitkaan yhteinen salaisuus kannettavanaan

programme.title: Girls Just Want to Have Fun
programme.desc: Vuosi on 1985. Pastellivarien, puutelihiusten ja otsanauhojen aikakautena nuori Janey uneksii tanssijan urasta. Koulua han on ehtinyt vaihtaa jo 11 kertaa, ja han tietaa etta ne eivat muutu miksikaan. Hanen uusimmassa koulussaan on tosin jotain erikoista. Ei se etta se sijaitsee Chicagossa, vaan se etta siella tehdaan suosittua nuoriso-ohjelmaa nimelta Dance TV. Taalla Janey tapaa tanssifriikki Lynnen joka houkuttelee hanet koetanssiin, ja menestyksen ovet alkavat avautua.

programme.title: Hehkuva kaupunki
programme.desc: On kulunut 200 vuotta siita; kun viimeiset ihmiset saivat turvapaikan maanalaisesta Emberin kaupungista; mutta nyt suuri genenaattori on menossa rikki.

programme.title: The Rum Diary
programme.desc: Hunter S. Thompsonin Rommipaivakirja-romaaniin pohjautuva elokuva seuraa kiertolaiselamaa viettavan reportteri Paul Kempin (Johnny Depp) viinanhuuruista matkaa halki Puerto Ricon pittoreskin saaren. Han on pian omaksunut paikallisvaeston rommiinhukuttautuvan elamantavan, ja tavattuaan hamarabisneksiin sekaantuneen amerikkalaisliikemiehen, Sandersonin (Aaron Eckhart), Paul on myos korviaan myoten retkussa miehen huumaavan kuumaan kihlattuun, Chenaultiin (Amber Heard).

programme.title: Henrys Crime
programme.desc: Rikollisen hauskassa komediassa tahaton ryostoapuri Henry (Keanu Reeves) paatyy vankilaan suojellessaan todellisia syyllisia. Ulos paastyaan Henry paattaa tarttua toimeen ja tehda rikoksen, josta hanet on jo kertaalleen tuomittu. Apurikseen teatraaliseen pankkikeikkaan mies palkkaa entisen sellitoverinsa Maxin (James Caan). Mutta paasy pankin ja pienen teatterin yhdistavaan tunneliin vaatii kaivamisen lisaksi myos nayttelijanlahjoja.

programme.title: Welcome to Collinwood
programme.desc: Tuomiotaan lusiva taparikollinen Cosimo saa vihia kaikkien aikojen keikasta. Miehen tyttoystava Rosalind alkaa valmistella keikkaa kalterien ulkopuolella ja pian osingolle on tunkemassa vahintaankin varikas sakki ”ammattimiehia”. Oman palansa saaliista haluavat niin turhautunut taiteilija kuin italialainen gigolokin, mutta alan miehia naista tuurikonnista ei saa tekemallakaan. Onneksi kokenut kassakaappimies Jerzy antaa tunareille pari neuvoa ja taydellinen rikos on lahempana kuin koskaan!

programme.title: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World
programme.desc: Valtava asteroidi lahestyy Maata, ja viimeinen keino sen pysayttamiseksi on juuri epaonnistunut. Ihmiset reagoivat 21 paivan paasta koittavaan maailmanloppuun varsin kirjavilla teoilla. Vakuutusmyyja Dodgen ja naapurintytto Pennyn tiet kohtaavat mellakoiden yltyessa ja he paattavat auttaa toisiaan matkalla kohti viimeisia paamaariaan.

programme.title: Awake
programme.desc: Mies heraa sairaalassa, eika hanella ole muistikuvaa siita, kuka han on tai miten han paatyi sinne. Hanta hoitava Diana (Eastwood) ei loyda mitaan henkilopapereita, joten han kutsuu miesta John Doeksi (Rhys Meyers). Poliisi syyttaa Johnia sarjamurhaajaksi, joka on tappanut useita nuoria naisia alueella. Kun Johnia aiotaan kuulustella, han onnistuu pakenemaan Dianan avulla, joka on varma hanen syyttomyydestaan. He ajavat viimeisimmalle rikospaikalle etsimaan johtolankoja ja vastauksia todistaakseen Johnin syyttomyyden. Hyva sairaanhoitaja kuulee raastavan totuuden Johnin henkilollisyydesta seka valheiden ja petosten verkosta, joka vie Johnin viela viimeiseen ratkaisevaan taisteluun.

programme.title: Plan A
programme.desc: Perustuu tositarinaan. Saksassa vuonna 1945 juutalaisvainoista selvinnyt Max tapaa radikaalin ryhman juutalaisia vastarintataistelijoita, jotka ovat hanen laillaan menettaneet kaiken toivon sen jalkeen kun heidan elamansa vietiin ja natsit tappoivat perheet. He unelmoivat vaikuttavasta kostosta juutalaisten puolesta. Elokuva kertoo vaarallisesta ja rohkeasta salaisesta operaatiosta, jota kutsuttiin A-suunnitelmaksi.

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: Don Martellin siloinen elama pyorii perheen, kavereiden ja punttitreenin ymparilla, minka lisaksi han kay uskollisesti kirkossa joka pyha. Kavereidensa ”Don Joniksi” ristima hurmuri iskee baarista pelkkia taydellisia naisia, joista kukaan ei kuitenkaan veda vertoja pornolle. Don joutuu arvioimaan keskenkasvuisia mieltymyksiaan uudestaan, kun han tapaa ihanan Barbaran, jonka kasitys unelmien miehesta ei vastaa lainkaan Donia.

programme.title: Kuutio
programme.desc: Seitseman toisilleen ventovierasta henkiloa, joilla kaikilla on erilaiset persoonat, asetetaan vasten tahtoaan loputtomaan sokkeloon, joka on taynna hengenvaarallisia ansoja.

programme.title: 10 Items or Less
programme.desc: Oscar ja Golden Globe palkittu Morgan Freeman esittaa elokuvatahtea, joka suunnittelee valkokankaalle paluuta neljan vuoden poissaolon jalkeen. Harkitessaan roolia supermarketin paallikkona, han kay pienessa latino-marketissa Los Angelesin laitamilla. Siella han tapaa kipakan kassaneidin, Scarletin (Paz Vega, Spanglish – kaannoskukkasia, Puhu hanelle). Huomatessaan olevansa kaukana kotoaan, ilman puhelinta taikka ajoneuvoa, elokuvatahti hyvaksyy Scarletin tarjouksen kyydista takaisin ”sivilisaatioon”. Matkan varrella tama ulkoisesti niin erilainen pari loytaa yhteisen savelen, joka pysyvasti muuttaa heidan suhtautumistaan elamaan.

programme.title: The Rum Diary
programme.desc: Hunter S. Thompsonin Rommipaivakirja-romaaniin pohjautuva elokuva seuraa kiertolaiselamaa viettavan reportteri Paul Kempin (Johnny Depp) viinanhuuruista matkaa halki Puerto Ricon pittoreskin saaren. Han on pian omaksunut paikallisvaeston rommiinhukuttautuvan elamantavan, ja tavattuaan hamarabisneksiin sekaantuneen amerikkalaisliikemiehen, Sandersonin (Aaron Eckhart), Paul on myos korviaan myoten retkussa miehen huumaavan kuumaan kihlattuun, Chenaultiin (Amber Heard).

programme.title: Toivon lahteet
programme.desc: Oltuaan 30 vuotta naimisissa keski-ikainen pariskunta ryhtyy intensiiviseen viikon kestavaan pariterapiaan tyostaakseen parisuhdettaan.

programme.title: Hehkuva kaupunki
programme.desc: On kulunut 200 vuotta siita; kun viimeiset ihmiset saivat turvapaikan maanalaisesta Emberin kaupungista; mutta nyt suuri genenaattori on menossa rikki.

programme.title: My Old Lady
programme.desc: New Yorkissa asuva tyhjatasku Mathias perii pariisilaisasunnon isaltaan, jota han ei koskaan tuntenut. Uudessa kiinteistossa Mathiasta odottaa kuitenkin yllatys vanhahkon, sivistyneen rouva Mathilden ja hanen suojelevaisen tyttarensa asuttaessa asuntoa. Ikivanhan ranskalaisen lakipykalan vuoksi omaisuutta ei voi siirtaa perijalle ennen asukkaan, eli Mathilden kuolemaa. Mathias paattaa yrittaa asunnon myymista kaikesta huolimatta, mutta vahitellen selviaa, etta hanen isallaan ja Mathildella on ollut pitkaan yhteinen salaisuus kannettavanaan

programme.title: Cypher
programme.desc: Yritysvakoilun hamarassa valtakunnassa kyllastynyt jokamies kompastuu petoksen verkkoon ja hanesta tulee tietamaton vakooja. Kun han navigoi petoksessa ja petoksessa, han tekee yhteistyota viettelevan arvoituksen kanssa paljastaakseen jarkyttavia totuuksia ja saadakseen takaisin identiteettinsa.

programme.title: 200 Cigarettes
programme.desc: On uudenvuodenaatto New Yorkissa vuonna 1981. Monica aikoo pitaa juhlat, mutta kello yhdeksaan mennessa kukaan ilmestynyt paikalle. Hanen vieraansa ovat tulossa, mutta he eivat pida kiiretta. Kevinilla ei ole halua juhlia uutta vuotta, koska hanet on vastikaan jatetty. Val ja Stephie eksyvat ja paatyvat klubille. Bridget ja Caitlyn yrittavat paasta eroon Bridgetin poikaystavasta Ericista. Kaikki he etsivat seksia, rakkautta tai molempia.

programme.title: Mama Weed
programme.desc: Kun alipalkattu poliisin tulkki huomaa takavarikon yhteydessa, etta yksi osallisista on hanen lahipiiriaan, han tekee kohtalokkaan paatoksen. Han onnistuu takavarikoimaan jattimaisen hasiseran, jonka seka poliisi etta alamaailma haluavat, ja kenttakokemuksellaan ja poliisin resursseilla han aloittaa oman rikollisen toimintansa ja vaihtaa huumediilerin uraan.

programme.title: Instrument of War
programme.desc: Kun Yhdysvaltain ilmavoimien B-24 pommikoneen pilotti Clair Cline ammutaan alas ja vangitaan Saksassa, hanen osaltaan yksi sota loppuu ja toinen - toivon yllapitaminen - alkaa. Natsien piikkilanka-aitojen saartama Cline ja muut sotavangit etsivat selviamisen lisaksi keinoja peitota vankeus. Perustuu tositapahtumiin.

programme.title: The Blair Witch Project
programme.desc: The Blair Witch Project seuraa elokuvantekijoiden triota, joka olisi pitanyt olla yksinkertainen kavely metsassa, mutta siita tulee nopeasti retki sydanta pysayttavaan kauhuun. Kun nama kolme menetetaan selittamattomasti, moraali heikkenee. Nalka alkaa. Syytokset lentavat. Matkansa lahestyessa he ymmartavat, etta se, mita he nyt kuvaavat, ei ole legenda ... vaan heidan oma laskeutumisensa kuvittelemattomaan kauhuun.

programme.title: Windtalkers
programme.desc: Raivokkaassa toisen maailmansodan Saipanin taistelussa kersantti Joe Enders (Nicolas Cage) vartioi – ja ystavystyy – Ben Yahzeen (Adam Beach) kanssa, nuoren navajon, joka on koulutettu kayttamaan ainoaa sodanaikaista koodia, jota vihollinen ei koskaan murtautunut... Navajo-koodia. Mutta jos Yahzee joutuu vihollisen kasiin, kuinka pitkalle Enders on valmis menemaan pelastaakseen armeijan voimakkaimman salaisuuden? John Woo ohjaa taman toimintapitoisen eeppisen elokuvan, joka on saanut innoituksensa navajosotilaiden todellisesta tarinasta, joiden rohkeus ja uhraukset auttoivat voittamaan sodan Tyynellamerella.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Uraansa aloittelevalle poliisille on vain yksi asia, joka on vaarallisempi kuin tappajan fantasian paljastaminen: tappajan fantasiaksi joutuminen.

programme.title: Criminal Activities
programme.desc: Nelja kaverusta tormaavat sijoitusmahdollisuuteen, joka vaikuttaa aivan liian hyvalta ollakseen totta. Kay ilmi, etta sijoitusmahdollisuuden takana onkin raakamaineinen rikollispomo. Velkansa kuittaamiseksi nelikon olisi onnistuttava kaappaamaan kilpailevan rikollispomon perheenjasen. John Travolta (Pulp Fiction), Michael Pitt (Boardwalk Empire) ja Dan Stevens (Downtown Abbey) tahdittavat toiminnantayteista trilleria.

programme.title: I Survived . . .
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Jim and Nell / Jennifer / Tammi
programme.desc: A couple hiking in a national park must fight for their lives.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Christmas is just around the corner, but Buffalos crucial food and mail runs come to a halt.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mechanic Cory races against the clock to turn two short-haul waterbombers into transatlantic aircraft for the epic journey to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A charter flight falls through the cracks after the McBryans attend a wild family wedding, and an irate Joe pulls captain Justin from the Turkey test flights to do the job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: AJ and Candace get married in the Ice Castle. A frustrated Chuck tries to get the Electra to pay her way. A flummoxed Mikey tries to bake a cake for Joes birthday.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Turkey crew makes the critical jump over the North Atlantic. But en route to Portugal, one crew is forced to turn back.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: C-46 and DC-4 crews race against the spring melt to fly mining equipment to an airstrip on a frozen lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After thousands of hours of painstaking preparation and dangerous flying, a terrible accident devastates the waterbomber crew in Turkey - and everyone at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When her husband quits after a blowout with Joe, Kelly is put in a terrible position. Will she stay at Buffalo - or will she go?

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After her husbands acrimonious departure from Buffalo, Kelly has a confrontation that decides whether she, too, will quit.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As Joe fights a Transport Canada claim against the airline, star pilot Justin is tasked with shipping an 8,000lb generator to a remote town.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a deadly fire destroys a northern outpost a week before Christmas, Buffalo puts everything aside to come to the rescue.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The curse of -40 hits Buffalo pilots Devan and Scott on a food mail flight up the Mackenzie Valley when a mysterious rise in oil pressure threatens to destroy one of the C-46s engines.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A vital ferry link is down, so Buffalo mounts an all-out campaign to airlift 100,000lbs of essential goods across the Mackenzie River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Crusty mechanic Chuck leads the scramble to ready the Electra for a disaster relief mission in Haiti, but fates curveball sends them to the High Arctic instead.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A multi-stop mission to the Far North has Devan, Scott and Adam facing a series of white- knuckle obstacles.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Young pilots AJ and Andrew get the chance of a lifetime to fly the magnificent DC-3 specially equipped with skis to land on frozen strips.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Chief pilot Arnie lands the DC-3 on a homemade sand strip at a remote lodge; Electra expert Chuck faces off with a stubborn power unit; Rods wife Sasha goes into labor.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When thunderstorms and a shaking engine threaten a DC-3 charter to Whitehorse, Joe pulls out all the stops to get the passengers to their destination.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: While training waterbomber captains for the upcoming fire-fighting season, Chief Pilot Arnie makes a surprising decision.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe hires Duane Hicks to help Buffalo navigate the future and coach Mikey; a DC-3 delivery mission goes awry when blizzard conditions and a broken oil cooler force an emergency landing.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Critical of the many stops and starts in the Electra program, and frustrated with the constant drama at Buffalo, Chuck quits.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Frustrated with her lack of flying and stuck in a rut as a courier driver, Audrey decides her time at Buffalo is over.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When a ferry breakdown causes a gasoline shortage in Yellowknife, new manager Duane begs Chuck to return and prepare the Electra for a fuel haul.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duane lands a huge contract for the Electra and puts enormous pressure on mechanic Adam to prep the plane without the help of his mentor Chuck.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra flies to Alert, the northernmost settlement on Earth, forcing Adam and new senior manager Duane to work things out.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Trying to make his mark at Buffalo, Duane lands two more Electra contracts.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Duanes decision to leave the Electra crew unsupervised while he spends time at home jeopardizes the completion of a major contract, and could cost him his job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine troubles on the C-46 during the valley run force Devan to shut down an engine.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When Yellowknife and the northern aviation community are rocked by three crashes in the space of a month, Joe places an extra emphasis on safety.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe receives a negative visit from Transport Canada when inspectors threaten to shut down the airline.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Weighed down by the responsibility of training a new rampie, and struggling to get out of Joes doghouse, DC-3 co-pilot Tyler gets a once in a lifetime opportunity to stunt fly in his Cessna 150 for a visiting film crew.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: After taking command of an intense airlift, and dealing with the ugliest Electra load hes ever seen, Scott takes a scary fall on the icy tarmac.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Just months from retiring, Electra captain Ray Weber leads his crew on a multi-trip mission that requires landing on a rough ice strip on a remote lake.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: When South Korean buyers come to Buffalo to look at a water bomber, the pressure is on mechanic Cory to get the plane ready.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory attempt to place a Canadair CL-215 aircraft onto a cargo ship for delivery to a Korean company.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: In South Korea, Cory and Justin meet the ship delivering Buffalos water bomber plane to new buyers there.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: As spring arrives and Rays retirement day approaches, Sean surprises everyone by leaving Buffalo for a job with the competition.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey hire a helicopter for a salvage mission to retrieve the rare tailpiece from a Lockheed 10-A that crashed in the Yellowknife woods forty years ago.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Justin and Cory are stranded in Croatia while trying to complete the delivery of two CL-215 water bombers to Turkey.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey links up with Chris Hadfield aboard the International Space Station. Problems mount while trying to get a frozen DC-4 airborne.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Rookie co-pilot David faces a remote Arctic airstrip with sketchy landing gear. Mikey drafts a Buffalo hockey team to face off against an NHL squad in a charity shootout. Chuck gets a chance to shine on the ice.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: A cold snap triggers massive challenges. Devan runs into gear problems while he ferries a mothballed DC-3 across the country. And Justin has to make a snap decision with his newborn son aboard his plane.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: The Electra returns from repairs and the crew takes it right back to the ice strip that it set off from before the crash landing last year. Tyler works up the courage to confront Joe about a big decision. A hotshot Australian pilot tries to earn a job.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Facing Joes wrath, Rod and Cory head to the UK to make urgent water bomber repairs. David tries to prove himself to Devan in the C-46 but ends up infuriating Devan. Will makes an ultimatum in Hay River.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Mikey trains for High Arctic survival with the Canadian Rangers. The Air Force invades Chucks hangar. Joe faces tough competition at a California plane auction.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Cory, Chuck and Brian watch as a 5,000-pound power unit smash to the ground, denting the Electra and putting it out of commission. Mikey scrambles to manage the crisis while Joe races to England to try and purchase a backup Electra.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Co-pilot Graemes fumbles his Electra training landings. Chris stresses over his C-46 check ride. Adam rescues a stranded C-46.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe and Mikey head to England to bring home a new plane. Devan does target-practice in the DC-4.James builds a Buffalo-style soapbox racer.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe flies with the Snowbirds during the Hamilton air show and later teaches Mikey to fly. A surprise departure shakes up Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: An engine fire and series of mechanical gremlins has Buffalo scrambling to make its Christmas deliveries. Newest rampie Prefkar Mony struggles with life in the North.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Buffalos Electra aircraft is hammered by rough winds up the Mackenzie Valley. In Hay River, a rookie crew faces the worst ice storm in years and one rampie has a tough go trying to fit in at Buffalo.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Engine trouble plagues Buffalos newest Electra, ZFE, and a standoff between Joe and Transport Canada threatens to close the airline. At the same time, Joe faces a tough decision about his old dog Sophie.

programme.title: Ice Pilots NWT
programme.desc: Joe leaves to undergo medical tests at the Mayo Clinic in Phoenix, Arizona. Jeff and Sam stress over their DC-3 checkflights and Joe celebrates turning 70-his way.
