programme.title: Daniel Hautot
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Daniel Hautot
programme.desc: He had a real professional rise, quickly moving from commercial to sales manager. But the awareness quickly catches up with him too: what is the purpose of all this? Is it a real pursuit of happiness? Daniel keeps his acquired skills and puts them to the benefit of his passion for yoga. Follow Daniel until the opening of his yoga and community space.

programme.title: Guillaume Nivelle
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Guillaume Nivelle
programme.desc: To make a profession representative of his personality is the discovery made by Guillaume at twenty-six. After several years as a bartender and crossing a dark period, Guillaume discovers nature and falls in love with it. Accompany Guillaume in his passion, in the middle of a refitted nature.

programme.title: Laura Belfadla
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Laura Belfadla
programme.desc: Laura will not tell you the whole truth because she does not want a system where you are told what to do. After several years as head of business development in law firm, Laura changes her life and creates the plant academy. Let yourself go for a healthier life.

programme.title: Laurence Sala
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen People - Season 2 - Laurence Sala
programme.desc: It took a burnout and several miscarriages to Laurence to take a new path. Its finally a bad thing for a good. Throughout her ordeals, Laurence will know how to listen to her needs, her desires and her passions. With a surprise, follow Laurence in her life as a mother and naturopath.

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Bangladesh - Part 2
programme.desc: With Bangladesh as a running thread, Yann Arthus-Bertrand meets several people who have changed their lives to dedicate themselves to a major project. In Bangladesh, Yves and Runa Marre have created the Friendship Foundation. Among other things, they’ve created a floating hospital installed on an old barge bought in France. Julie Andersen, an ex-advertising executive from New York, has come to South Africa to defend sharks with her Shark Angels Foundation. In North India, Kartik Satyanarayan is helping to stop the dreadful exploitation of the lippus bears (dancing bears). He’s created Wildlife SOS, a preserve to rehabilitate the bears that have been rescued and to give work to the men of...

programme.title: Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 1 - Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 2
programme.desc: Through the most magnificent images and amazing human stories, Man is at the heart of the biodiversity that he must respect and preserve. We go to China in the province of Yunan, where a plant with exceptional virtues against malaria has been discovered. Then we travel to Africa, where mans intervention in the ecosystem of Lake Victoria has triggered a considerable imbalance. We will also explore to Greenland to meet the polar bears, the first victims of the melting ice.

programme.title: Sweets on the menu
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Sweets on the menu
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us down a different kind of yellow-brick road, one that tastes of childhood and gourmet delights: the road of sweets. France may be famous for its gastronomy, but its not to be outdone when it comes to pastries and confectionery - quite the opposite. “Betises” from Cambrai, "Berlingots” from Carpentras, "Calissons” from Aix-en-provence, every region in France has its own sweet or confectionery.

programme.title: Destination Sardinia
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Sardinia
programme.desc: The first stop on this journey to the land of happy, long life is the Ogliastra region of Sardinia. Here, almost one in five inhabitants is over 90 - 20 times more than in France! Yet this is a far cry from the Mediterranean diet recommended by nutritionists: meat and cholesterol galore. Even more astonishing, consanguinity is paradoxically conducive to the extreme longevity of the inhabitants... our wellness food specialist and a general practitioner will investigate these phenomena and meet nonagenarians and centenarians with exceptional stories.

programme.title: Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 2
programme.desc: To better understand the role of these explosive mountains located all over the world, on land or under the sea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes to Italy, the country with the most active volcanoes in Europe. Accompanied by volcano expert Jacques-Marie Bardintzeff, the photographer meets those people who have chosen to live with « their » volcano, in spite of the dangers involved in this kind of proximity.

programme.title: Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 1 - Everything is living and everything is linked - Part 1
programme.desc: Through the most magnificent images and astonishing human stories, Man is at the heart of the biodiversity that he must respect and preserve. We find ourselves in Kenya, where the biodiversity is particularly rich, in the Massaï Mara reserve. Then, in the Democratic Republic of Congo, where the worrying disappearance of hippos from Lake Edward has unexpected consequences for the survival of fishermen. Then, in the sanctuary of life, the Pantanal region in Brazil, where millions of animal and plant species are teeming, some of the worlds great wetlands also in danger. In Tasmania, Yann Arthus-Bertrand fights against the napalm deforestation of one of the oldest and most beautiful forests...

programme.title: The flavors of flowers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - The flavors of flowers
programme.desc: Eating flowers might appear unconventional, but we often consume them without even realizing it. Consider artichokes, for instance : they are essentially large, unopened flowers. Capers are the preserved buds of flowers soaked in vinegar, and cloves are dried flower buds. We also find courgette flowers, saffron pistils, orange blossom water used to flavor pastries, and the violet sweets that evoke memories of our childhood. In addition to adding aesthetic appeal and providing a dose of vitamins to our plates, flowers elevate the flavors of a dish and can even serve as a vegetable substitute.

programme.title: Escape
programme.desc: Watch beautiful landscapes from all over the world !

programme.title: Hot Yoga Session
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 1 - Hot Yoga Session
programme.desc: Always on the look for looking for new detox discoveries, Val leads us to Lifehouse’s tonic and elixirs. Here, she discovers the range of elixir with therapeutic virtues exhilarating and relaxing. Before leaving, we made a hook by Jacks lab to prepare our own elixir. A private hot Yoga session then awaited Val at the popular Urban Exhale Hot Yoga where wearing a swimsuit could be welcomed. This episode ends on a fruity note as we tasted smoothies with unusual names that seduced Val, especially the 72 and Sun.

programme.title: Zero Gravity Bath with Sinclair
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Trendy - Season 2 - Zero Gravity Bath with Sinclair
programme.desc: Val gives an appointment to the singer Sinclair, for a floating session: a sensory deprivation technique in a bath. Then, we will discover an experience that is all the rage across the Atlantic, the Barre Shape! Its a class that mixes classical dance, yoga and cardio training. All this in a girly and boudoir atmosphere. After the effort comes comfort! We will meet a Superfood expert who will make us test and discover all the "Superfoods" that are very popular in California and that the whole healthy world is talking about.

programme.title: Collecting seeds
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My First Garden - Season 1 - Collecting seeds
programme.desc: We meet in the market garden of Romainville to learn how to save seeds. As you may have noticed, fruits, such as apples and lemons, contain seeds, but so do some of the vegetables you eat, such as peppers and tomatoes. This is because they are, in fact, fruits just like the apple and the lemon. They come from a flower and therefore contain seeds.

programme.title: Destination Okinawa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Blue Zones of Longevity - Season 1 - Destination Okinawa
programme.desc: Genetic, biological, cultural and dietary factors combine to make the Japanese island of Okinawa a zone of extreme longevity. Why is it that cancer is virtually non-existent here? Well see that the famous Japanese trio of "rice, fish and soy" is not the key to longevity, but a diet based on plants, lots of green leafy vegetables and endemic sweet potatoes. Self-restriction and strong social ties are other elements that our naturopathic chef and attending physician will discover on site, together with local inhabitants and scientists.

programme.title: USA: The end of oil - Part 2
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 3 - USA: The end of oil - Part 2
programme.desc: "The end of oil" is the amazing story of a raw material which has revolutionized mans life in just a century. But today, oil reserves are depleting. In his crazy race for always more production, Man didnt manage to preserve this precious energy that took million years for the Earth to give out. To tell the adventure of oil, Yann Arthus-Bertrand and his team went to the United States, the country which depends the most on black gold. At the start of the 21st century, it is now urgent to realize that oil resources are limited. Its today that we have to act and get organized, in order to prepare the new era to come. While all our economies are based on the petrol barrels price, well...

programme.title: Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Nature’s Heroes: Senegal - Part 1
programme.desc: For this new episode, Yann Arthus-Bertrand travels through Senegal to encounter men and women who dedicate their lives to preserving the environment. One of the major ecological stakes of the country is fishing and the mangrove ecosystem which, like in some many other parts of the world, faces major threats. Yann Arthus-Bertrand presents the struggle of Haidar El Ali, chosen among one of the world’s most active ecologists. He creates protected marine areas and reforests the disappeared mangrove of his country. He’s managed to convince thousands of Senegalese to plant with him ten million mangrove trees.

programme.title: Spicy kitchen
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Julies Frenchy Cookbook - Season 4 - Spicy kitchen
programme.desc: Today, Julie takes us on a tour of spices and aromatic plants. Spices are a call to travel, to faraway lands and to the unknown. In the kitchen, they bear witness to our relationship with others, reflecting our vision of the world. Julies journey will introduce us to the famous black pepper, thanks to Erwann de Kerros, an insatiable pepper seeker. Aromatic plants will also be in the spotlight, as we pick them with Edouard Loubet in the Luberon...

After learning to make some delightful and healthy wrap in restaurant KYE’S, she does sightseeing in Malibu Wine Hikes, the organic grapes garden behind Malibu’s famous beaches. programme.title: Masashi Hirao
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bonsai Bad Boy - Season 1 - Masashi Hirao
programme.desc: In 2003, Masashi Hirao became the last apprentice of Japans great Bonsai master Saburo Kato. Before Saburo-san died he passed on to his apprentice a seemingly impossible mission: to prevent the 1000 year old art from dying-out in the face of a rapidly changing world and achieve his master’s vision of bringing peace to the world through bonsai. Masashi’s early efforts are dogged by many failures but combining his master’s guidance and modern instincts he sets out to travel the world and discover the way, drawing on innovative trends in contemporary art.

programme.title: Tough pregnancies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 My Zen Family - Season 1 - Tough pregnancies
programme.desc: Clara and Gianni are worried, since a pregnancy with twins is always riskier. She’s due in two months, and has already undergone two medical interventions. Kim, nineteen, is fine physically, but she has to face her family’s criticism: she still lives at her parent’s, and the absence of the father-to-be worries them a great deal. Coralie would rather be safe than sorry, and meets with a prenatal consultant. Her nightmare: being turned down for an epidural procedure... Nathalie and Naoufel are looking at the bright side of life and are chilling on granddaddy’s boat, before letting themselves enjoy a family photo shoot.

programme.title: Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Earth from above - Season 4 - Volcanoes: The violent Earth - Part 1
programme.desc: To better understand the role of these explosive mountains located all over the world, on land or under the sea, Yann Arthus-Bertrand goes to Italy, the country with the most active volcanoes in Europe. Accompanied by volcano expert Jacques-Marie Bardintzeff, the photographer meets those people who have chosen to live with « their » volcano, in spite of the dangers involved in this kind of proximity.

programme.desc: Origami is about the art of paper folding, a Japanese and Chinese millenary tradition. We will teach you how to transform a flat square sheet of paper into a finished sculpture – from simple to complex!

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #1 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The worlds best freeriders will compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The first stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 19th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #33: Qatar Airways GKA - Best of Big Air Kite World Championships
programme.desc: Welcome to the Qatar Airways GKA Bite Big Air World Tour! This thrilling season takes us to two breathtaking locations: the vibrant coastal town of Barcarès, France, and the stunning shores of Salinas de Tenefe in Spain. Get ready for the worlds top kiteboarders!

programme.title: WOF 2024 #12: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon and Sainte Lyon
programme.desc: Join us in France for the 39th Gorges de l’Ardèche International Marathon in the stunning Ardèche gorge, followed by the legendary SainteLyon night run in Lyon and Saint-Étienne, now in its 69th edition and attracting up to 20,000 participants annually!

programme.title: Fond of Font
programme.desc: Seb Berthe and Hugo Parmentier have set themselves quite a challenge: to complete 100 7A boulders on a single day. An extraordinary journey of over 80 km, when you consider how demanding these rocks are. Crimps, falls, slips but above all a magnificent human adventure.

programme.title: Actionclip OERM22 AUT BestOf
programme.desc: Actionclip OERM22 AUT BestOf

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship - Behind the Scenes
programme.desc: On todays show we’re taking care of not only the gasheads but also the fans of water sport as we head down under to see what a lot of power on a small boat can do with the Australian V8 Superboats.

programme.title: APP – History, Legacy and Best Moments
programme.desc: In this weeks episode we´re taking a closer Look at the APP, the association of paddleboard professionals. From the contests, to the unique trips and fascinating personalities. So, grab you boardshorts and sunglasses. Today we´re going to the beach.

programme.title: Line and Air - with Geraldine Fasnacht
programme.desc: Swiss snowboard legend Geraldine Fasnacht is an experienced pilot. She invites two other freeride greats, Leo Slemett and Emilien Badoux, to join her riding several couloirs at some glaciers of the Swiss and French Alps.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europes premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship 2024
programme.desc: MotoSurf World Championship in Croatia: This year, when the championship hosted the qualification for the World Games as part of the Championship, 109 racers representing 21 different countries and 3 continents competed in Zadar.

programme.title: Desert Dash Namibia 2024
programme.desc: The Desert Dash 2024 is an exhilarating mountain biking event that challenges riders to conquer the breathtaking terrain of the Namib Desert. Spanning over 24 hours, participants embark on a grueling 369-kilometer journey.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Cape Verde hosts the GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024, bringing together the world’s best kite-surfers. Athletes from around the globe compete for the title, showcasing impressive skills in wave-riding and strapless freestyle.

programme.title: 2025 iQFOiL World Championships - Live Delayed Part 1
programme.desc: Aarhus, Denmark, became the venue for the iQFOiL World Championships from July 4-11, 2025, offering the worlds best windsurfing athletes a test of skill and speed. This world-class sailing venue has a reputation for pushing competitors to their limits

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 4
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 5
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing

programme.title: Cape Epic 2024 - Stage 6
programme.desc: The Absa Cape Epic is the world’s premier mountain bike stage race. The route changes every year, leading aspiring amateur and professional mountain bikers from around the world through 617 Untamed kilometres of unspoilt scenery and up 16 500m of climbing.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #2 Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: The worlds best freeriders compete again at this years Freeride World Tour. The second stop takes place in Ordino Arcalís, Andorra on the February 24th. The Andorran Pyrenees offers an amazing variety of terrain and venues that could host the competition.

programme.title: UCI World E-Bike Series Eps. 27
programme.desc: In today’s episode we’ll give you all the lowdown on the first two races of the World E-Bike Series. These events unite the muscle power and skills of the world’s best mountain bikers with electric driven bikes. A combination that promises a lot of thrills!

programme.title: Kayak Expedition Norway
programme.desc: Today’s episode is an exciting show about a unique kayak expedition to Norway’s white-water treasures at the Arctic Circle. Expect remote mountains, raging rivers and challenging rapids!

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championships 2021 | Rd. #1-3
programme.desc: V8 Superboats is one of the most extreme and spectacular forms of motorsport on the planet. Imagine 1600-horsepower in a purpose-built aluminium boat that can accelerate to 120kph in under 2-seconds, and turn with the kinds of G-Forces.

programme.title: Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Fuwairit (QAT)
programme.desc: Fuwairit Beach is the venue for the Visit Qatar GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, where the worlds best freestyle kiteboarders put their skills to the test. With constant wind, this hotspot in Qatar offers the perfect conditions for the competitions.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Ibiraquera (BRA)
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the worlds best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 - Jericoacoara (BRA)
programme.desc: The Copa Kitely GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 will take place in Jericoacoara, where the worlds best wingfoilers will compete against each other. With its legendary winds, this Brazilian jewel offers ideal conditions for high-speed racing.

programme.title: Golden Fly Series Genf (SUI) 2024 - Part 1
programme.desc: Geneva will host the Golden Fly Series 2024 athletics spectacle for the first time! On Saturday 21 Sep, the worlds best long jumpers and pole vaulters will be competing for important world ranking points on the largest mobile World Athletics-certified athletics facility in the world.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #06: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle-Kite World Cup 2022 - Taiba (BRA)
programme.desc: Die letzte Runde der Freestyle-Disziplin auf der Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour beginnt am Dienstag, 8. November. Beim Freestyle-Kite World Cup Taiba messen sich die besten Freestyle-Kiter der Welt bei perfekten Bedingungen auf der beruchtigten Lagune.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #07: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #1 - Baqueira Beret (ESP)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 startet im Januar in ihre 16. Saison - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus aller Welt! Der erste Stopp der Tour findet in Baqueira Beret statt.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #08: Freeride World Tour 2023 - Stop #2 - Ordino Arcalís (AND)
programme.desc: Die Freeride World Tour 2023 hat ihren zweiten Stopp in Ordino Arcalís Pro, Andorra - wie immer mit den besten Freeridern aus der ganzen Welt! Damit kehrt die FWT in das Freeride-Mekka der Pyrenaen zuruck.

programme.title: WOF 2023 #09: Mediterranean Epic 2023
programme.desc: Die 4. Edition des Mediterranean Epic ist der Auftakt der Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Es ist ein 4-tagiges Rennen (UCI Hors Categorie), das in Castellon, Oropesa del Mar (Spanien), stattfindet.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour 2024 will host the second stop of the freestyle discipline in Cauipe in north-eastern Brazil. The Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup offers intense competitions in the shallow waters.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #45: Freestyle Pro Tour 2024
programme.desc: Welcome to World of Freesports and the Freestyle Pro Tour 2024! Get ready to witness the world’s best freestylers perform jaw-dropping tricks and intense competition on the water. Let the battle for the title begin - it’s time for freestyle action!

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2025 - Axamer Lizum (AUT) - Live delayed
programme.desc: Be part of the World Downhill Skateboarding Championship 2025 in Axamer Lizum, Austria! At this exciting high-speed event, the best downhill skateboarders from all over the world will race down the picturesque Alpine roads at breathtaking speeds.

programme.title: Emocean - Surf Documentary
programme.desc: Today we take you on an unparalleled surf trip to some of the most famous, as well most terrifying waves on the planet. We will listen to some intimate stories of extraordinary people literally living IN and WITH the ocean.

programme.title: Tenerife Blue Trail
programme.desc: We are back in Tenerife, one of the highlights of the ultra running calendar, for the 10th edition of the Tenerife Blue Trail. Tenerife is described as an outdoor gym open 365 days a year - a paradise for every athlete.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix - European Karting Championship
programme.desc: Karting is a great life school for young people. The FIA ​​Karting Championships are open to drivers aged 12 and over and there is no upper age limit.

programme.title: GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 - Dakhla (MAR) - Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The GKA Kite-Surf World Cup 2024 will take place in Dakhla. This Moroccan hotspot is known for its constant winds and breathtaking lagoon and offers perfect conditions for exciting freestyle performances.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024 – Ibiraquera (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: Ibiraquera is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the worlds best wingfoilers will meet. With its constant winds and breathtaking coastline, this Brazilian hotspot provides the perfect backdrop for exciting races.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Big Air Kite World Cup 2024 – Jericoacoara (BRA) – Overall Highlights
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour will electrify the coast of Jericoacoara, Brazil, with competitions in its three big air divisions - TwinTip, Hydrofoil and Surfboard. A total of 57 athletes will be competing for the world championship titles at the premiere.

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 – Cauipe (BRA) – Overall Highlights

programme.title: Expedition Antarctica - Caro North - Antarctic
programme.desc: Ice climbing, ski mountaineering and days of sailing on open waters through the infamous Drake Passage: 28-year-old extreme athlete Caro North set off for a four-week expedition to the far south of our continent.

programme.title: Mammut Biggest Peak Project 2 - USA
programme.desc: The Swiss mountaineering company Mammut is celebrating its 150th anniversary with the largest summit project in history: 150 summit ascents are being organized worldwide as part of the “150 Peaks Project”.

programme.title: Dani Arnold - Ice Climbing at Lake Baikal
programme.desc: Swiss extreme sportsman Dani Arnold went on a challenging expedition to the deepest lake on earth - Lake Baikal. The Siberian winter provided accordingly difficult and fascinating conditions.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2021 - #3 Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: Two successful competitions went down in Ordino Arcalís, and now it’s Crunch Time for athletes striving to keep their campaigns on track in Fieberbrunn, Austria.

programme.title: WES - World E-Bike Series, UCI E-Mountainbike World Cup Cross Country, Race 7 and 8 - Monaco
programme.desc: Hello and welcome to WES World E-Bike Series Round 7 and 8. For the first time since 2019, the Monaco - Alpes-Maritimes Round will welcome the Season Finale, this time with a brand new track in the French area of Turini, and the much awaited awards ceremony.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Autumn: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing in the World’s most diverse terrain, exploring all four corners of the island, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean.

programme.title: E-Bike World Tour 2024
programme.desc: The Verbier E-Bike Festival, held in Verbier, Switzerland, from August 14-18, 2024, is Europes premier e-mountain biking event, attracting thousands of participants and spectators. In its sixth edition, the festival features a diverse range of activities.

programme.title: WOF 2025 #04: Maneuvre Vancouvre - with Hans Rey
programme.desc: In “Maneuver Vancouver”, mountain bike icons Hans Rey, Steve Peat and Wade Simmons embark on an exciting five-day journey through Vancouver. Join these three legends as they explore this iconic city.

programme.title: FIA Karting Grand Prix
programme.desc: October 1st - 4th, 2020, In Lonato, Italy, the worlds leading concentration camp gear kart racers will strive for glory and honor to win the ultimate award - the title of World Champion.

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships
programme.desc: The world championship for karting in the OK direct drive category for junior and senior racers is finally upon us, as the field descends on Kartodromo Algarve in Portimao, Portugal, just two weeks after Formula One returned to this incredible country.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Champioships
programme.desc: World Champion and European Champion in Karting. The CIK-FIA presents the most up-to-date Championships which bring together the best drivers and the greatest hopefuls of motor sport of the future during races of an incredible intensity.

programme.title: Winter Games 2017 - Freeride Ski and Snowboard - New Zealand
programme.desc: Stunning scenery, world’s best talent and Kiwi hospitality is set to be showcased to a global audience with Winter Games New Zealand revealing its most diverse event yet. Winter Olympic, Paralympic and X Games stars are heading to New Zealand once again.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour 2106/17 - Part 1 - Italy
programme.desc: The World Snowboard Federation (WSF) is the international organization exclusively working to develop the sport of snowboarding at all levels, especially with worldwide events four young and talented riders.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Moscow (RUS)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Snow Bike Festival 2019 - Gstaad (SUI)
programme.desc: The Snow Bike Festival 2019 is THE event of the young snow bike boom and brings together like-minded athletes from all over the world. With the extra wide and grippy wheels you are ready for your exciting ride in the snow.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Hakuba (JPN)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour (FWT) has expanded to Asia! The season opener of the worlds most important freeride series for skiers and snowboarders takes place in Hakuba (JPN).

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Deutschnofen (ITA)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Kicking Horse, Golden BC (CAN)
programme.desc: After an epic start to Winter 2019 in Hakuba, Japan, the worlds best make their way across the Pacific to North America for the second competition of FWT19 at the legendary Canadian Rockies resort of Kicking Horse, Golden BC.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Championships 2019 - Latzfons (ITA)
programme.desc: Im Gegensatz zu kunstlichen Rodelbahnen bestehenden Naturbahnen aus BergstraSSen und -wegen. Naturbahnrodeln erfordert eine vollig andere Technik als auf einer Kunstbahn. Im Ziel entscheiden Hundertstelsekunden uber Sieg oder Niederlage.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: With two events in the pipeline and a fiercely competitive race for the world title quickly unfolding, the best in the world will get their chance to “Hold The Line” in Fieberbrunn as FWT19 enters the European leg of the season.

programme.title: FIL Natural Track Luge World Cup 2018/19 - Umhausen (AUT)
programme.desc: In contrast to artificial toboggan runs, natural toboggan runs consist of mountain roads and trails. Natural track tobogganing requires a completely different technique than on an artificial track. At the finish, hundredths of a second decide whether you win or lose.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2019 - Ordino Arcalis (AND)
programme.desc: Its that time of the season again when points mean everything: racing for the world title, qualifying for the final in Verbier and the 2020 season. The stage is set for what is sure to be a hard-fought competition in Ordino Arcalís

programme.title: Episode 50
programme.desc: WORLD OF FREESPORTS 2025 - Episode 50

programme.title: Simple Session 2024 - Skate Final
programme.desc: Simple Session was born in 2000, starting as a small-town competition, it has now blossomed into one of the worlds largest and most prestigious BMX and skateboarding contests. Simple Session 24 is set on August 24-25, promising a spectacular festival!

programme.title: Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024 - Cauipe (BRA)
programme.desc: The Cauipe lagoon is the venue for the Copa Kitley GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2024, which brings together the best freestyle kiteboarders in the world. The Brazilian paradise offers the perfect playground for explosive tricks.

programme.title: GWA Wingfoil World Cup - Sal (CPV)
programme.desc: Sal is the venue for the GWA Wingfoil World Cup 2024, where the best wingfoilers in the world will meet for an exciting competition. This paradise in Cape Verde is known for its strong winds and rolling Atlantic waves.

programme.title: People in Motion
programme.desc: People of Motion is a sport documentary about a group of people who turn to parkour in their lives -- sometimes to get rid of frustration, sometimes just to feel the ground and be part of something.

programme.title: WOF 2024 #14: Open Faces and X Over Ride
programme.desc: This episode is all about talent. First, The young guns of the global freeride scene gather in Austria to battle it out for the world titles. Then, an FWT Qualifier and an FWT Challenger event will decide who will advance to the elite level of the Freeride World Tour.

programme.title: The Mt. Logan Wanderers
programme.desc: At 5959m, Mount Logan is the 2nd highest peak in North America, and certainly one of the wildest mountains in the world. To reach it, Helias Millerioux, Alex Marchesseau, Thomas Delfino, and Gregory Douillard did not choose the easy option.

programme.title: FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn Challenger – Zell am See-Kaprun - Live delayed Part 1
programme.desc: The FWT Challenger 2025 X Over Ride Kitzsteinhorn took place from March 15 to 18, 2025 in Zell am See-Kaprun. At this event as part of the Freeride World Tour qualification series, top freeriders competed against each other on the slopes of the Kitzsteinhorn

programme.title: Fortress of Fear
programme.desc: Grandpa translates an ancient stone tablet which directs the gang to locate the “Fortress of Fear.”

programme.title: Eye of the Storm
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends discover that in order to return home to the real world they must pass a series of tests known as the Five Sacred Trials.

programme.title: Trial of Light and Shadow
programme.desc: After narrowly escaping their battle in the desert, the gang finds themselves stranded on a mysterious floating island.

programme.title: Red-Eyes Black Curse
programme.desc: It’s on to level three as Yugi and his friends are transported to a lava-covered wasteland.

programme.title: Fruit of Evolution
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends are faced with an impossible task – locating a magical apple in a forest full of apple trees.

programme.title: The Fiendish Five, Part 1
programme.desc: The gang stumbles upon a small kingdom dominated by a clan of fierce dragons known as The Fiendish Five.

programme.title: The Fiendish Five, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi and his friends defeat the Fiendish Five…or so they think! These ferocious dragons have merged together and are now more powerful than ever!

programme.title: The True King, Part 1
programme.desc: Although the gang has passed the five sacred trials, the most dangerous test is yet to come.

programme.title: The True King, Part 2
programme.desc: Yugi’s friends are unconscious, leaving him to defeat Alexander the Great on his own!

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 1
programme.desc: The hunt for the Mythyrian Numbers leads our heroes to the peak of a perilous mountain where Kite’s skills are put to the test by a dragon-wielding Number Guardian!

programme.title: Put to the Test: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite faces his toughest challenge ever when a powerful Number Guardian threatens to take possession of his Galaxy-Eyes!

programme.title: Furry Fury
programme.desc: After an ancient statue is unearthed, Yuma finds himself between a rock and a furry place when he discovers that there’s more to Girag than meets the eye – like a red nose and whiskers!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 1
programme.desc: It’s rough waters ahead for Yuma and his friends when the search for the last two Mythyrian Numbers leads them to an ancient ruin that lies beneath the bottom of the ocean!

programme.title: A Sea of Troubles: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle beneath the ocean reaches new depths of danger when Shark comes face to face with the Number Guardian, Abyss!

programme.title: A World of Chaos: Part 1
programme.desc: Earth and Astral World are under attack! Yuma and Astral are the only ones who can stop it, but saving their planets may come at the ultimate price…

programme.title: A World of Chaos: Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between our two heroes and Number 96 comes to a shocking conclusion that leaves only one person standing!

programme.title: Memory Thief: Part 1
programme.desc: Someone’s stealing memories, and the Super Secret Numbers Club are going to find out who! But when the hunters become the hunted, Yuma’s friends quickly realize that they need help from an exterminator!

programme.title: Memory Thief: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma and Trey team up to take down a bugged out Barian who likes to munch on memories! Can Yuma and Trey swat down this winged menace before he swoops in to drain their brains?

programme.title: Tentacles of Terror: Part 1
programme.desc: With Vector’s patience for failure fading fast, Mr. Heartland begs for a final chance to beat Yuma! Desperate to deliver, Heartland deploys his most dangerous duelist to date, a treacherous Barian armed with toxic tentacles!

programme.title: Tentacles of Terror: Part 2
programme.desc: Shark and Quattro struggle to keep their heads above water as they battle the Barian duelist from the deep, Chironex!

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s all set to travel across the stars to save Astral, but an unexpected pest pops by to plunder Yuma’s plans!

programme.title: Tomb of the Nameless Pharaoh
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil and treachery he faced to find the artifact!

programme.title: Spiritual Awakening
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, yearning and prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game!

programme.title: Memoirs of a Pharaoh
programme.desc: Yugi and friends are going to the dawn of the duel, to the land where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh’s mysteries lie: Egypt!

programme.title: The Intruder, Part 1
programme.desc: The fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh’s palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: The Intruder, Part 2
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn’t prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping!

programme.title: Makings of a Magician
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura’s sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can’t keep!

programme.title: Birth of the Blue-Eyes
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh’s guardians, has fallen!

programme.title: Village of Lost Souls
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created?

programme.title: A Reversal of Fortune
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura’s Diabound.

programme.title: In Search of a King
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss.

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 1
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle!

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 2
programme.desc: It’s the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh.

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 3
programme.desc: With the help of his father’s spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated Bakura’s Diabound and stopped Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 4
programme.desc: The secret is out! The Pharaoh’s journey was more than a trip to the past – it’s the greatest Shadow Game ever created!

programme.title: Village of Vengeance, Part 5
programme.desc: Zorc’s incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound!

programme.title: Name of the Game
programme.desc: Karim is the next to fall under the bandit Bakura’s assault, and the ravaging robber won’t stop until he conquers the rest!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 1
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 2
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 3
programme.desc: Even Exodia the Forbidden One was unable to defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Dark One Cometh, Part 4
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated!

programme.title: In the Name of the Pharaoh
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba’s combined strength couldn’t defeat Zorc!

programme.title: The Final Journey
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel... Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 1
programme.desc: The time of destiny is now! Yugi vs. Atem!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 2
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 3
programme.desc: Not only does Atem still have all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn’t have a single monster on the field!

programme.title: The Final Duel, Part 4
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem – more than friends, closer than brothers.

programme.title: Swing Into Action- Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya Sakaki aims to become an "Entertainment Duelist". He practices dueling every day alongside his childhood friend, Yuzu. One day, he receives a challenge for an exhibition match from the Pro Duelist, "Strong Ishijima". Although Yuya excitedly fends off his attacks in their Action Duel, hes eventually pushed into a corner.

programme.title: Swing Into Action- Part 2
programme.desc: With The Sledgehammer set to strike, Yuya uses Pendulum power to swing the duel his way! Can this phenomenal new summoning method help Yuya hammer the Hammer?

programme.title: Trade Bait - Part 1
programme.desc: It could be curtains for Yuya when a rival student cons him out of his Pendulum Cards!

programme.title: Trade Bait - Part 2
programme.desc: Still shocked by Sylvios Pendulum Summon, Yuya must find his focus if he wants to save his friends from a 100-story drop!

programme.title: Toying Around - Part 1
programme.desc: The new kid in town drives Yuya bananas when he begs Yuya to be his duel teacher! Unfortunately for Yuya, this blue-haired battler wont give up until Yuya gives in!

programme.title: Toying Around - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuyas getting schooled by his wannabe student, Sora! Can Yuya turn things around and teach Sora a lesson about winning, or is Yuyas Pendulum power not going to make the grade?

programme.title: Mr. Mystery
programme.desc: Still steaming from his loss to Yuya, Sylvio looks to get some payback! But when Zuzu steps in to stop his plans, a mysterious stranger comes out of the shadows to show her how its done!

programme.title: Bad Business
programme.desc: The Leo Institute is looking to take over Yuyas duel school, and theyre bringing 3 of their most dangerous duelists to take down whoever dares stand in their way!

programme.title: Dueling with the Stars
programme.desc: The battle to save Yuyas duel school goes galactic when Yuya faces off against Leo Institutes Dipper, an out-of-this-world duelist whose interstellar skills could have Yuya seeing stars!

programme.title: You Show Em
programme.desc: Its a gem of a duel when Zuzu faces a fierce Fusion Summoner whose jewel monsters are a cut above the rest! Can Zuzu and her Divas belt out a victory, or will the Leo Institutes diamond of a duelist force a final face-off?

programme.title: Going, Going, Gong
programme.desc: Its all up to Gong to save You Show from falling into the hands of the Leo Institute! Can Gong stare down defeat without moving his feet, or will a sword-swinging Syncro Summoner slice and dice his way to victory?

programme.title: Battle Under The Big Top
programme.desc: Its a battle under the big top, but no ones clowning around! Yuya duels Declan to determine the fate of Yuyas duel school!

programme.title: Circus Surprise
programme.desc: Declan has a surprise in store that could swing the duel his way! Can Yuya take down the best the Leo Institute has to offer, or will Declans deck prove to be unbeatable?

programme.title: The Show Must Go On
programme.desc: Yuyas down in the dumps, but Principal Boyles not having it! Looking to snap Yuya out of his funk, Skip challenges Yuya to a duel to prove that the show must go on!

programme.title: In It To Win It
programme.desc: Still stinging from her defeat against the Leo Institute, Zuzu turns to an unlikely source for some assistance - Sora! But before her training can commence, a familiar looking stranger shows up, putting her lesson on hold!

programme.title: Menu Venue - Part 1
programme.desc: To gain eligibility to join the Junior Youth Championship, Yuya has to win 4 official duels consecutively. He ends up dueling is Michio Mokota, a cuisine Duelist with high popularity among the housewives.

programme.title: Now or Never: Part 2
programme.desc: Kite and Quinton team up to swat down the bug-eyed Barian Scritch! But when Kite starts hallucinating, Quinton must fend off their flying foe while simultaneously steering clear of his confused partner’s attacks!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 1
programme.desc: Yuma’s mission to find Astral turns into a high-stakes race against time when Yuma learns the Guardian of Astral World plans to erase his best friend from existence!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 2
programme.desc: Yuma faces his toughest challenge yet when he battles against an opponent who can draw the exact card he needs every turn!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 3
programme.desc: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 3
programme.desc: Yuma fights to free his best friend Astral in a duel he cannot win but must not lose! Meanwhile, Shark comes face-to-face with his past and learns the truth about his Barian background!

programme.title: Mission: Astral World: Part 4
programme.desc: With Astral’s fate hanging in the balance, the heart-pounding battle between Yuma and Astral World’s Guardian thunders to its frenzied finish!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 1
programme.desc: To get a lead on Yuma and his buddies, Vector bombards Earth with bogus Numbers. When one of them takes the bait, it puts Mr. Heartland and his sinister swarm of insect monsters hot on the gang’s heels!

programme.title: Assimilation: Part 2
programme.desc: With Kite grounded, Yuma and Astral step up to take the buzzing Barian, Mr. Heartland down! Can our heroes repel this pest, or will they end up getting squashed instead?

programme.title: Battle with the Barians
programme.desc: When all seven Barian Emperors ambush Yuma, some friendly faces drop in to help take the Barians out!

programme.title: Battle with the Barians
programme.desc: When all seven Barian Emperors ambush Yuma, some friendly faces drop in to help take the Barians out!

programme.title: Fight for a Friend
programme.desc: Quattro faces off against the Barian leader, Nash! Hoping to find Shark swimming just beneath his new Barian identity, Quattro looks to hook his old friend and reel him back in!

programme.title: Farewell for a Friend
programme.desc: The back and forth battle between Nash and Quattro comes to a climactic conclusion! Will this battle lure the real Shark out from inside his Barian form, or will it cost Quattro much more than he ever could have imagined?

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 1
programme.desc: Looking to get revenge for their brother Quattro, Trey and Quinton team up to take down the treacherous Barian, Mizar!

programme.title: Settling the Score: Part 2
programme.desc: As Quinton and Treys devastating double duel against Mizar flares to a feverish finish, the brothers reveal the real reason they are battling the Barian! Their startling secret hits Mizar harder than any attack!

programme.title: Menu Venue - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya faces a ferocious attack against Michio Mokotas Cooking Duel.

programme.title: Trapped in a Card
programme.desc: Its a case of mistaken identity when Yuya is eyed as the primary suspect for attacking Leo students! But when Yuya crosses paths with the real culprit, things go from bad to worse!

programme.title: Quiz Quagmire - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya matches minds with the quiz whiz extraordinaire Pierre LSuperieure in a duel of wits! Can Yuya outsmart the smartest boy on Earth, or will Yuya end up scratching his head in defeat?

programme.title: Quiz Quagmire - Part 2
programme.desc: In the finale of the mind-bending match thats part-duel, part-quiz show - one wrong answer could mean curtains for Yuya! Can he outduel and outthink a trivia whiz whos never wrong?

programme.title: Beyond Belief
programme.desc: Duelists throughout the city are continuously being attacked, and everyone is on the search to find out the who, how and why!

programme.title: A Date With Fate - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuyas future takes a terrifying turn for the worse when he battles a fortunetelling foe who predicts this will be his last duel ever! Can Yuya fix his fate and avoid a devastating disaster, or has his luck finally run out?

programme.title: A Date With Fate - Part 2
programme.desc: As Yuyas battle against the fortunetelling predictress Aura flares to its finish, it becomes crystal clear that Yuyas danger-filled future is becoming a reality

programme.title: For Our Tomorrows
programme.desc: Mysteries are revealed when the masked duelist whos been terrorizing Leo Institute students is confronted and challenged to a battle royal!

programme.title: Battle Between Buddies - Part 1
programme.desc: Yuya needs one more win to get into the Championship, but it will be his most difficult battle yet when he discovers he has to beat his best bud Gong in order to move on!

programme.title: Battle Between Buddies - Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between best buds Yuya and Gong for a spot in the Arc League Championships rages to a friend-zied finish!

programme.title: Challengers Assemble
programme.desc: Let the games begin! The top duelists from around the globe have gathered together for the Arc League Championships to find out whos the best duelist in the world!

programme.title: Somethings Fishy
programme.desc: Allie is looking to make a big splash at the Arc League Championship, but she soon finds herself in over her head! Can Allies deck of fishy friends turn the tides, or will her mysterious opponent sink her chances of winning?

programme.title: Fusion Foes
programme.desc: Zuzu takes center stage in an epic rematch against Leo Institutes dueling diamond, Julia Krystal! Will Zuzu avenge her earlier loss and walk away a winner, or will history repeat itself and leave Zuzu singing the blues?

programme.title: Gong the Strong
programme.desc: When Gongs old sparring partner sets a trap for Yuya, the only way Gong can save his friend is to forfeit his duel and get tossed from the tourney!

programme.title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways - Part 1
programme.desc: Sylvio finally has just the thing to take Yuya down - a deck full of Pendulum Cards! Could Yuyas days in the spotlight be done for?

programme.title: The Pendulum Swings Both Ways - Part 2
programme.desc: Yuya is off his game and on the run as Sylvio zeroes in on zeroing out his life points! If Yuya cant get into the swing of things, this could be his final performance!

programme.title: Making the Cut - Part 1
programme.desc: Sora is psyched to put on a showstopping duel for the fans, but his opponent Shay is set to turn Soras one man show into a no man show!

programme.title: Making the Cut - Part 2
programme.desc: Sora and Shays heated duel hits its boiling point when dark secrets about their hidden history come to light! Could there be something sinister behind Soras sweet-toothed smile?

programme.title: Soras Secret - Part 1
programme.desc: While Yuto is looking for answers, Sora is looking to get some revenge! But when these two tangle, Yuya finds out more than he ever expected!

programme.title: Soras Secret - Part 2
programme.desc: Surprises are in the cards as the battle between Sora and Yuto comes to an unexpected conclusion! But just when Yuya thinks hes seen everything, a new face shows up on the scene that makes Yuya do a triple take!

programme.title: A Dark Reflection
programme.desc: Yuya cant believe his eyes when he finds himself standing face-to-face-to-face with two lookalikes who are out to destroy each other... and everything in sight!

programme.title: Warped Dimensions
programme.desc: Yuya is in a coma, and nothing has been able to stir him from his terrifying state! Is Yuya down for the count, or will his duelmates ESP and TLC make him A-OK?

programme.title: A Duel Personality
programme.desc: Yuyas opponent is Isao Kachidoki from the Ryozanpaku School in the second round of the Maiami Championship.

programme.title: Stealth Warriors
programme.desc: When a mysterious visitor threatens to throw the Championship into chaos, Declan moves in to uncover who they are and soon finds himself facing off against a merciless mercenary!

programme.title: Bracing for Battle
programme.desc: Declan confronts Celina and shares a story from their past that reveals a frightening future!

programme.title: Battle Fields
programme.desc: Its time for a nail biting battle royal in the ARC League Championship! With four battle zones to choose from, the action has never been more mesmerizing or the duels more dangerous!

programme.title: Fire and Ice
programme.desc: While Yuya is looking to knock the competition out cold in the Volcano Zone, the Iceberg Zone is heating up as Zuzu and Gong team up to defrost their foes

programme.title: Danger Zones
programme.desc: As the battle royal rumbles on, Yuya finds himself caught in the crossfire when he stumbles across a battle between not-so-noble Knights!

programme.title: Obelisk Assault
programme.desc: Yuya takes on a terrifying trio from Fusion Dimension who turn their victims into cards!

programme.title: Dragons Vengeance
programme.desc: Outnumbered, outmatched, and out of options, will Yuya tap into a deep-seeded darkness to overcome defeat?

programme.title: Identity Crisis
programme.desc: Zuzu races to stay one step ahead of a cold-blooded hunter whos hot on her heels! Can Zuzu ditch this danger, or will he prove too cunning for her to escape?

programme.title: Battlefronts
programme.desc: Sparks fly in the Volcano Zone when all our heroes face off against the full fury of Fusion Dimensions elite Obelisk Force! With more than life points on the line, the action has never been hotter!

programme.title: Fighting for Fun
programme.desc: Are friends now foes as Yuya and Sora go deck to deck in a fiery face-off?

programme.title: Dueling Declan
programme.desc: When Yuya discovers Declans web of lies put his friends in danger, he challenges Declan to a battle as payback!

programme.title: Kings vs Dragons
programme.desc: Yuya’s battle with Declan takes a turn for the worse when Declan’s majestic monsters give Yuya the royal treatment!

programme.title: Parental Guidance - Part 1
programme.desc: It’s a family feud when Yuya takes on his mom in a duel where there’s more to lose than just his allowance! Can Yuya avoid being run down by Paradise City’s most feared motorcycle momma?

programme.title: Parental Guidance - Part 2
programme.desc: The battle between Yuya and his mom kicks into high gear! Can Yuya avoid being grounded, or will Loco Yoko put the pedal to the metal and throttle her way to victory?

programme.title: City Scape
programme.desc: As Zuzu and Yugo try to unravel the riddle of Yuyas dimensional doubles, their sleuthing is cut short by Sector Security!

programme.title: Tops Speed
programme.desc: Zuzu and Yugo redline their Duel Runner in a high-stakes Turbo Duel with Sector Security! Can they outrun the long arm of the law, or will Security put the brakes on their escape?

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E340 Undercover Love S1 E340
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E94 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E94
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E340 King of Hearts S1 E340
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E340 Second Chances S1 E340
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E32 Jodha Akbar S4 E32
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E340 This is Fate S1 E340
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Mehek
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E94 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E94
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E340 King of Hearts S1 E340
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E340 Second Chances S1 E340
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E32 Jodha Akbar S4 E32
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the eras wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S01 : E340 This is Fate S1 E340
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Bombay to Bangkok
programme.desc: Chef Shankar Bhatawdekar lives a middle-classed lifestyle in Mumbai along with his widowed mom. After an encounter with a gangster named Khan, who finds out that Shankar has stolen a valuable item that belonged to his son, Jamal, sends Shankar fleeing to Bangkok, Thailand, along with a team of medical professionals. He manages to conceal the item amongst medical supplies, and poses as a medical professional himself. He blunders his way as a medico, arousing suspicion, especially by Dr. Rati, compounded by the arrival of Khans son, Jamal, and his romance with Jasmine, a volunteer and a part-time masseuse, She, too, is attracted to him - without knowing that this attraction will soon get...

programme.title: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster 3
programme.desc: Madhvi Devi now turned to politics is enjoying her power and position in royal house after Aditya Pratap Singh lands in jail while his second wife Ranjana has turned alcoholic.Aditya Pratap is soon to be released from jail and Madhvi feels this could harm her position as both are still hungry for each others power and blood.Madhvi finds she is pregnant after she spends night with Aditya upon his return they both decide to raise the baby by forgetting their bygones.London based Uday Pratap Singh has his roots in India where he is having tiff with his father Maharaja Hari Singh and brother Vijay while his only support is his mother Yashododhra.Uday has Suhani as his keep in India while has...
